senses.definition: 重覆再做一樣嘢，再試一次 (to repeat an action; to go back again)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 喺被攻擊之後還擊、報復 (to take revenge; to fight back)

examples.text: 佢贏咗一局之後就走咗，想覆灼都冇機會呀！
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jeng4 zo2 jat1 guk6 zi1 hau6 zau6 zau2 zo2, soeng2 fuk1 coek3 dou1 mou5 gei1 wui6 aa3!
examples.translation: He left after winning the round, I didn't even have a chance to take my revenge!

senses.definition: 單位、樓層入面嘅小間隔（量詞：間） (room)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: beng6 fong2
examples.translation: hospital ward

senses.definition: 比喻容易被騙嘅顧客 (metaphor for customers who are easily deceived)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢間補習社專劏肥羊㗎，乜嘢都收你錢。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 bou2 zaap6 se5 zyun1 tong1 fei4 joeng4 gaa3, mat1 je5 dou1 sau1 nei5 cin2.
examples.translation: This tutoring center specifically targets gullible customers, charging you for everything.

senses.definition: 受上級嘅命令而有所行動 (to act under orders)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fung6 ming6 hang4 si6
examples.translation: to follow the order and act

senses.definition: 學習內容嘅類別（量詞：個） (curricular subject; course)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hat6 sam1 fo1 muk6
examples.translation: core subject

senses.definition: 冇水，乾涸 (dry)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: fu1 zeng2
examples.translation: a dried-up well

senses.definition: 植物缺乏營養同水份，冇生命力 ((of branches and flowers) withered)

examples.jyutping: fu1 sei2
examples.translation: withered to death

senses.definition: 能夠防止子彈穿透物件 (to be bulletproof; to prevent bullets)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fong4 daan2 bo1 lei1
examples.translation: bulletproof glass

senses.definition: 放喺動詞後面，表示一個動作中斷咗，之後再繼續進行 (placed after a verb to describe the resumption of an interrupted action)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: zou6 faan1 nei5 jing1 goi1 zou6 ge3 je5.
examples.translation: Go back to work on whatever you should be doing.

senses.definition: 放喺動詞或者形容詞後面，表示好轉、回復嘅意思 (placed after a verb or adjective to show that something is getting better or reverting to its original state)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 san1 tai2 hou2 faan1 hou2 do1 laa3.
examples.translation: My health is getting a lot better now.

senses.definition: 放喺動作後面，表示該動作係為自己好，或者為人哋好而做 (placed after a verb to show that an action is for the speaker's own good or for the sake of someone else)

examples.jyutping: sik6 faan1 caan1 hou2 ge3!
examples.translation: Let's eat something good!

senses.definition: 計算一啲面積好大，唔係好厚嘅嘢 (measure word for big, flat, sheet-like objects, especially pictures, banners, etc.)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 fuk1 jau4 waa2
examples.translation: an oil painting

道教做法事嘅道具，一張寫滿字或者符號嘅紙（量詞：道／張） (Taoist magic writings to invoke or expel spirits and bring good or ill fortune)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: waak6 fu4
examples.translation: to scribe on seals

senses.definition: 應對嘅辦法 (way; means)

examples.jyutping: mou5 fu4
examples.translation: no way to handle or deal with

senses.definition: 一塊好長嘅感光膠片，通常係啡色半透明；光線進入#相機 或者#攝錄機 之後，會將影像紀錄喺菲林上面，啲菲林可以沖曬成#相 或者整成#影片（量詞：卷／筒／格） ((English loanword) film; roll of film (for still photographs))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 而家香港越嚟越難買到菲林。
examples.jyutping: ji4 gaa1 hoeng1 gong2 jyut6 lai4 jyut6 naan4 maai5 dou2 fei1 lam2.
examples.translation: It is increasingly difficult to buy film in Kong Kong now.

senses.definition: 以影印等方式複製出嚟嘅版本；唔係最原本、原始嘅版本（量詞：個／份／張） (duplicate; copy; photocopy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: san1 fan2 zing3 fu3 bun2
examples.translation: photocopy of an ID card

senses.definition: #相機 嘅一部分；相機影相嘅時候，快門會打開，畀光線進入相機嘅感光元件，之後就會閂埋；快門就好似相機嘅門噉，一打開就可以畀啲光線入嚟；快門嘅速度可以控制相機嘅入光量，打開得越耐，進入相機嘅光線就越多（量詞：個） (shutter, a component of a camera)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 快門開啓再關閉，即係影咗一幅相。
examples.jyutping: faai3 mun4 hoi1 kai2 zoi3 gwaan1 bai3, zik1 hai6 jing2 zo2 jat1 fuk1 soeng2.
examples.translation: When the shutter opens and closes, the camera has taken one photo.

senses.definition: 處理#審訊、#訴訟 嘅機關，亦指進行審訊、訴訟嘅場所（量詞：個／間） (court of law; tribunal; usually referring to the institution, but can also refer to the physical location)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: miu5 si6 faat3 ting4
examples.translation: contempt of court

senses.definition: 一種職業；幫人睇#風水，判斷一個地方嘅位置、坐向、擺設嘅好壞（量詞：個） (fung shui master)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種職業；幫人睇#風水，判斷一個地方嘅位置、坐向、擺設嘅好壞（量詞：個） (fung shui master)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 了解對方嘅意見睇法 (to interview)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋想訪問下校長對罷課嘅意見。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 soeng2 fong2 man6 haa5 haau6 zoeng2 deoi3 baa6 fo3 ge3 ji3 gin3.
examples.translation: We want to interview the school principal about his view on the student strike.

senses.definition: 皇室、官員等等正式參觀、探訪一個地方 ((of the royal family, officials, etc.) to visit)

examples.jyutping: fong2 man6 gu1 ji4 jyun2
examples.translation: to visit an orphanage

senses.definition: 方形船隻；通常指基督宗教、猶太教、伊斯蘭教所講嘅挪亞方舟，係為咗俾挪亞一家以及各種陸上生物避免大洪水災難而建造 (ark (ship); usually refers to Noah's Ark)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 貨幣之間嘅#匯率 隨住市場供求關係而升跌嘅制度 ((fin.) floating exchange rate)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 天賜嘅好運氣（量詞：種） (blessing; good fortune; luck; happiness)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: san1 zoi6 fuk1 zung1 bat1 zi1 fuk1
examples.translation: to take good fortune for granted

senses.definition: (麻雀用語) 屬#番子 牌，圖案係一個綠色「發」字；為三元牌之一，同 #白板、#紅中 合稱「中發白」 ((in mahjong)  one of the honor tiles, the pattern is a Chinese character "Rich" in green color ; it belongs to Dragon tiles, with the White Board, Red Center, called "Center, Rich, White Dragons". Literally: rich in money)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 裝飯嘅碗，多數用瓷或膠造嘅（量詞：隻） (rice bowl)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lo2 di1 faan6 wun2 ceot1 teng1 sin1.
examples.translation: Take the rice bowls to the living room.

senses.definition: 職業、生計（量詞：個） (job; means of living)

examples.jyutping: tit3 faan6 wun2
examples.translation: a secure job; a job from which one is unlikely to be dismissed; especially, a government job; literally, iron rice bowl

senses.definition: 將一樣嘢嘅#面 同#底 倒換；由下變上、上變下，或者由內變外、外變內 (to turn over; to reverse)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faan2 zyun3 gin6 saam1 zoek3
examples.translation: to wear a clothing inside-out

senses.definition: 去一個地方同人接觸交流 (to interview; to visit)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: gaa1 fong2
examples.translation: home visit

senses.definition: 調查 (to investigate)

examples.jyutping: ming4 caa4 am3 fong2
examples.translation: to investigate, openly and secretly

senses.definition: 比較凸顯出嘅分別 (contrast)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hou2 daai6 faan2 caa1
examples.translation: great contrast

senses.definition: 以前漁港中提供性服務嘅艇 (in the old days, the boat in typhoon shelter providing prostitution service)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟固定#頭髮 嘅小工具（量詞：隻） (hair clip)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #燃燒 所需要嘅三項要素，即係#燃料、#氧氣 同#熱力 (fire triangle i.e. combustion triangle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟限制同主導人類喺社會上嘅行為嘅守則；通常由政權制訂，有一定正當性，違反會受懲罰（量詞：條） (law; laws; legislation; statutes)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 遵守法律係所有人嘅責任。
examples.jyutping: zeon1 sau2 faat3 leot6 hai6 so2 jau5 jan4 ge3 zaak3 jam6.
examples.translation: Everyone hast a responsibility to obey the law.

senses.definition: 平均噉分派利益 (to prearrange the bids at an auction or in a tendering exercise; literally: to divide small cakes)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #短跑 比賽嘅#冠軍 (the champion of short race (running))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺#十進制 運算中，形容累積位值大於九時，增加下一個位位值一 (in decimal system arithmetic operations, to carry the next column by 1)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 發出某隻語言嘅聲音 (pronunciation; articulation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你嘅發音唔準，要練多啲。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ge3 faat3 jam1 m4 zeon2, jiu3 lin6 do1 di1.
examples.translation: Your pronunciation is inaccurate and you'd better practice more.

senses.definition: 一種傳遞或散發#能量 嘅方式，以#波 或#粒子 嘅形式穿過空間或介質嚟傳遞或散發能量；喺一般人認知中，輻射係指紅外線、可見光、X光呢啲電磁波，以及α波、β波同中子波呢啲粒子波；但其實喺物理學上，音波都係輻射嘅一種。 (radiation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: taai3 joeng4 fuk1 se6
examples.translation: sun radiation

senses.definition: #小巴 嘅俗稱；因為小巴引起嘅交通事故通常涉及超速駕駛而得名 (minibus; literally "flying coffin")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #私家車，尤其指比較貴嘅；亦喺一種比較正經嘅講法（量詞：架／部） (saloon (car))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 中獎者將獲得價值五十萬嘅名貴房車一部。
examples.jyutping: zung3 zoeng2 ze2 zoeng1 wok6 dak1 gaa3 zik6 ng5 sap6 maan6 ge3 ming4 gwai3 fong2 ce1 jat1 bou6.
examples.translation: The winner of this prize will receive a luxury saloon worth 500k.

senses.definition: 輕型貨車、#van仔（量詞：架） (light goods vehicle; van)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baai2 di1 mat6 zi1 soeng5 fo3 wen1 sin1 laa1.
examples.translation: Load the goods onto the van first.

senses.definition: 唔認同；持相反意見；唔想某個提案被實行 (to oppose; to be against; to object to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 faan2 deoi3 nei5 ge3 tai2 faat3.
examples.translation: I am not against your point of view.

senses.definition: 即係#部下 (subordinates)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 為人麾下祇係可以跟人柯打做嘢啦。
examples.translation: As a subordinate, your job is to follow orders.

senses.definition: 形容人為所欲為，唔理自己行動嘅後果 (unruly; reckless)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 你係咩人啊？竟然敢喺我地頭放肆！
examples.jyutping: nei5 hai6 me1 jan4 aa3? ging2 jin4 gam2 hai2 ngo5 dei6 tau4 fong3 si3!
examples.translation: Who are you? How dare you be so unruly in my territory!

senses.definition: 考慮到負面限制或者後果，而唔做一件事 (disinclined to do something; so as to avoid; not to bother something; not worth the trouble)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢咁唔講道理，我都費事理佢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 m4 gong2 dou6 lei5, ngo5 dou1 fai3 si6 lei5 keoi5.
examples.translation: He's so unreasonable that I won't bother to take any notice of him .

senses.definition: 擴大（營商）規模，以達致持續發展 (an expansion of business, to increase one's business substantially)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 如果當日我冇發大嚟做，公司就唔會有今日嘅成就。
examples.jyutping: jyu4 gwo2 dong1 jat6 ngo5 mou5 faat3 daai6 lai4 zou6, gung1 si1 zau6 m4 wui5 jau5 gam1 jat6 ge3 sing4 zau6.
examples.translation: If I didn't take any risks to expand our business on that day, our company wouldn't have today's achievements.

senses.definition: 將一件物件嘅體積由細變大 (to increase the volume of an object)

examples.text: 啲粉團搓完之後都仲要放喺度發酵，等佢發大先可以拎去焗爐焗㗎。
examples.jyutping: di1 fan2 tyun4 caai1 jyun4 zi1 hau6 dou1 zung6 jiu3 fong3 hai2 dou6 faat3 haau1, dang2 keoi5 faat3 daai6 sin1 ho2 ji5 ling1 heoi3 guk6 lou4 guk6 gaa3.
examples.translation: After kneading the dough, it needs to be left to ferment until it has expanded, then we can put it into the oven.

senses.definition: 物理學上量度一件嘢浮喺流體（如水、空氣）中嘅能力 (buoyancy)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 阿松帶咗個浮力勁嘅#水泡，話噉就唔驚#浸親 喎。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 daai3 zo2 go3 fau4 lik6 ging6 ge3 seoi2 pou5, waa6 gam2 zau6 m4 geng1 zam6 can1 wo4.
examples.translation: A-chung brought an extra-buoyant swim ring and said we don't have to worry about drowning.

senses.definition: 突如其來有#運氣 (surprisingly lucky;originally from the word "fluke")
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 之前完全冇温書，噉都合格真係負碌！
examples.jyutping: zi1 cin4 jyun4 cyun4 mou5 wan1 syu1, gam2 dou1 hap6 gaak3 zan1 hai6 fu6 luk1!
examples.translation: I didn't revise at all. It was just a fluke that I passed the exam!

senses.definition: 流動嘅#空氣（量詞：陣） (wind)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ceot1 min6 hou2 daai6 fung1.
examples.translation: It's really windy outside.

senses.definition: 消息、通常係非正式渠道得到嘅消息 (news; rumors; information; often not official)

examples.jyutping: fong3 fung1
examples.translation: to unofficially release information

senses.definition: 專指#熱帶氣旋（量詞：個） (tropical cyclone)

examples.text: 個風殺到嚟喇，天文台話兩個鐘後掛八號。
examples.jyutping: go3 fung1 saat3 dou3 lai4 laa3, tin1 man4 toi4 waa6 loeng5 go3 zung1 hau6 gwaa3 baat3 hou6.
examples.translation: The typhoon is coming, the Observatory said no. 8 typhoon signal will be hoisted two hours later.

senses.definition: 氣動機械系統裏面嘅氣壓 (the air pressure in a pneumatic system)

examples.jyutping: bik6 lik1 fung1 biu1
examples.translation: brake air gauge

senses.definition: 中醫之中，六淫（又稱六邪，六種病因）之一，源於大自然嘅風。亦可以指由「風」入侵而生嘅病症或者症狀，又或者身體自己內生嘅類似症狀。又稱 #風邪。 (wind; wind-evil. In Chinese medicine, one of the Six Excesses (or the Six Evils, the Six Pathogenic Factors) originating from winds in nature. It also means a kind of diseases or symptoms caused by the invasion of wind, or similar symptoms but arising from the body on their own.)

examples.jyutping: jap6 fung1
examples.translation: to be invaded by wind

senses.definition: 見到、易明，冇懷疑，冇第二樣動機、理由 (obviously; clearly; plainly; evidently)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 個答案分明錯啦，四乘六點會係單數呀？
examples.jyutping: go3 daap3 on3 fan1 ming4 co3 laa1, sei3 sing4 luk6 dim2 wui5 hai6 daan1 sou3 aa3?
examples.translation: The answer is obviously wrong, how could you get an odd number from 4 times 6?

senses.definition: 同上，易明、冇懷疑，再有明確表示自己嘅立場，通常有「唔俾面」嘅意思 (unabashedly; obviously, clearly as above, showing somebody's feeling or attitude without concealment)

examples.text: 佢日日遲到，分明搏炒啫。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat6 jat6 ci4 dou3, fan1 ming4 bok3 caau2 ze1
examples.translation: He is late every day. He obviously wants to be fired.

senses.definition: #表格（量詞：份／張） (form)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tin4 fom1
examples.translation: to fill in a form

senses.definition: 中學嘅年級（講年級嘅時候，後面會講英文數字） (grade in secondary school (to be matched with English numbers))

examples.jyutping: fom1 fo1
examples.translation: Form 4; Secondary 4

senses.definition: 即係#辦法；處理問題嘅手段（量詞：個） (way; method)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: mou5 faat3 zi2
examples.translation: to have no solutions to deal with a problem in an undesirable situation

senses.definition: #美國#國旗。只會配某啲詞使用。 (The national flag of USA)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: faa1 kei4 gwok3
examples.translation: nickname of the United States of America

senses.definition: 形容貨品嘅質素符合佢嘅價錢；通常係店舖用嚟吸引客人嘅標語 (genuine goods at a fair price (common expression used by merchants to attract customers))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 貨真價實呀喂！埋嚟睇埋嚟揀呀喂！
examples.jyutping: fo3 zan1 gaa3 sat6 aa3 wai3! maai4 lai4 tai2 maai4 lai4 gaan2 aa3 wai3!
examples.translation: Quality goods at reasonable prices! Come check them out!

senses.definition: 形成火災嘅起火點，持續不斷噉燃燒 (head of a fire;)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 紛爭嘅源頭 （量詞:個/處） ((fig.) initiation of quarrels or disputes)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 zung1 ji3 sei3 wai4 laat3 fo2 tau4
examples.translation: He likes to stir up trouble.

senses.definition: 付出更多努力去追返上進度 (to pay more efforts to catch up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 比賽去到一半，佢都仲未發力。
examples.jyutping: bei2 coi3 heoi3 dou3 jat1 bun3, keoi5 dou1 zung6 mei6 faat3 lik6.
examples.translation: We're halfway through the match, and he hasn't exerted himself yet.

senses.definition: #燃燒 產生嘅一團發光#氣體，通常係橙黃色（量詞：團） (flame)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 反對辯題所述立場、同#正方 對立嘅一方 (opposition (in a debate))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋今次係反方，要諗啲反對呢個立場嘅論點。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 gam1 ci3 hai6 faan2 fong1, jiu3 nam2 di1 faan2 deoi3 ni1 go3 lap6 coeng4 ge3 leon6 dim2.
examples.translation: We are the opposition this time and we need to think of arguments against the motion.

senses.definition: 去你本身身處嘅地方、屋企、故鄉 (to come back; to return to a place, someone's home or hometown)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faai3 di1 faan1 lei4 laa1.
examples.translation: Come back soon.

senses.definition: 喺動詞後面，表示#得到 咗 (to have acquired; to have obtained)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: mong5 soeng6 tai2 faan1 lei4
examples.translation: saw online

senses.definition: 加喺動作後面，指動作嘅方向係對方或者原本個位置 (back)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 faan1 heoi3
examples.translation: to call back

senses.definition: 用棍棒以旋轉嘅模式嚟攪動液體 (to whisk)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faak6 daan2 hei3
examples.translation: whisk

senses.definition: 揮打棍棒、鞭 (to beat someone with sticks; to whip someone)

examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 jung6 tang4 tiu2 faak6 jan4.
examples.translation: Don't whip others with rattan cane.

senses.definition: 生物將#氧氣 帶入體內，排出#二氧化碳 嘅整個過程；亦即係#吸氣 加#呼氣 (to breathe; to respire)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fu1 kap1 san1 sin1 hung1 hei3.
examples.translation: Breathe the fresh air.

senses.definition: #衫 同配襯嘅#飾物（量詞：種／款／套） (costume and adornment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 依度有好多唔同嘅服飾買。
examples.jyutping: ji1 dou6 jau5 hou2 do1 m4 tung4 ge3 fuk6 sik1 maai5.
examples.translation: There are many different clothes and accessories for sale.

senses.definition: 生物將#氧氣 帶入體內，排出#二氧化碳 嘅整個過程；亦即係#吸氣 加#呼氣 (the physical process of breathing or respiration)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 mou5 zo2 fu1 kap1, tai2 lai4 sei2 zo2.
examples.translation: He doesn't breathe. It seems like he is dead.

senses.definition: 將樓盤嘅公用空間計入出售時標示嘅建築面積，令到實際嘅面積細過標示嘅面積好多嘅#單位，2011年政府改例後就解決咗呢個問題（量詞：層） (real estate property with an inflated advertised claim of floor area; primarily referring to advertised properties under the regulatory scheme before 2011.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢層發水樓，話就話五百呎，實質度出嚟得三百五，真係離晒譜！
examples.jyutping: ni1 cang4 faat3 seoi2 lau2, waa6 zau6 waa6 ng5 baak3 cek3, sat6 zat1 dok6 ceot1 lai4 dak1 saam1 baak3 ng5, zan1 hai6 lei4 saai3 pou2!
examples.translation: This inflated flat claims to be 500 square feet, but its actual measurement is only 350. This is outrageous!

senses.definition: 用#化妝品 嚟#扮靚 (to put on makeup)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢每朝出門口之前，都會用三十分鐘化妝嘅。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mui5 ziu1 ceot1 mun4 hau2 zi1 cin4, dou1 wui5 jung6 saam1 sap6 fan1 zung1 faa3 zong1 ge3.
examples.translation: She spends half an hour to put on her makeup before marching off to work every morning.

senses.definition: 冇趣味到成為一種折磨 (dejected; intensely boring; feeling bored and low)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: gok3 dak1 sang1 wut6 hou2 fu2 mun6
examples.translation: to feel that life is boring

senses.definition: 全職#警察 之外，兼職警員編製，通常只負責部分警員工作；喺香港，輔警指香港輔助警察隊 (auxiliary police force; in Hong Kong, it refers to The Hong Kong Auxiliary Police Force)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 輔警成員 (member of such a force)
用好快嘅速度去開車 (to drive at high speed; literally, to fly a car)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fei1 ce1 dong2
examples.translation: (illegal) street racers

senses.definition: 利用高能量#X光 或者電子破壞癌細胞，治療#癌症 (radiotherapy; radiation therapy)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 裝喺#單車 後#轆 左右嘅兩個細轆，用嚟幫啲人學踩單車（量詞：個） ((bicycle) training wheels)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 畀#貨櫃船 停泊，同裝卸#貨櫃 嘅#碼頭，亦會提供地方暫存貨櫃（量詞：個） (container terminal; container port)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 快速#抗原 測試；短時間內檢驗體液樣本內有冇#病毒 抗原嘅測試，用嚟初步檢測有冇受病毒感染 (rapid antigen test (RAT))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: faai3 caak1 git3 gwo2
examples.translation: rapid antigen test result

senses.definition: 用於#消毒 殺菌嘅#酒精 類液體，無色透明，只可以#外用，唔可以#飲 (rubbing alcohol; alcohol that is used for sanitizing  or disinfecting purposes, not suitable for drinking)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 俾火酒捽下，就整得走啲貼紙印㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: bei2 fo2 zau2 zeot1 haa5, zau6 zing2 dak1 zau2 di1 tip3 zi2 jan3 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: Rub it with alcohol, then you will be able to remove the sticker mark.

senses.definition: 圍繞住#風眼 嘅雲，係強烈#熱帶氣旋 入面嘅強烈雷暴區，通常係當中天氣最差嘅地方（量詞：層） (eyewall (of a tropical cyclone))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 處於強烈#熱帶氣旋 中心，天氣相對平靜，通常呈圓形嘅地帶，喺成個氣旋之中嘅氣壓通常係最低（量詞：個） ((of strong tropical cyclones) eye; literally: wind eye)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fung1 ngaan5 coeng4
examples.translation: eyewall

senses.definition: 車速限制較高嘅公路，通常唔畀停車，唔畀行人使用（量詞：條） (expressway)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 運載好多#貨櫃 嘅大#船（量詞：艘） (container ship)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 放生、放過敵人，冒住日後畀敵人惹麻煩嘅險 (to let an enemy go and take the risk of him causing trouble later; literally: to let the tiger return to the mountain)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 運#貨櫃 嘅#貨車，一般係由#拖頭 拉住冇動力、擺貨櫃嘅#拖架（量詞：架） (semi-trailer truck for transporting shipping containers; container truck)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟儲存#貨物，以方便運送嘅大型長方體鐵箱（量詞：個） (container for freight transport)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fo3 gwai6 maa5 tau4
examples.translation: container terminal

senses.definition: 皇帝嘅妾侍 (imperial concubine)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 皇室男性成員嘅妻子 (imperial concubine; wife of a male member of the imperial family)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: imperial concubines

senses.definition: 由長方狀切成片狀嘅#麪包（量詞：塊） (sliced bread; sandwich bread)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngau4 jau4 fong1 baau1
examples.translation: buttered sliced bread

senses.definition: #皮膚；包裹住動物肌肉嘅表皮 (skin)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: pei4 fu1
examples.translation: skin (human or animal)

senses.definition: 形容人祇係睇表面因素，例如外貌、金錢等等 (skin-deep; superficial; shallow)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 吓你揀女朋友齋睇樣咋，咁膚淺呀乜你。
examples.translation: So you are telling me that you choose girlfriends base on their looks. How superficial are you.

senses.definition: 增加人壓力嘅嘢（量詞：個） (burden; responsibility)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ging1 zai3 fu6 daam1
examples.translation: economical burden

senses.definition: 下放權力；將一部份權力，由上級轉移到下級，或者由中央政府轉移到地方政府 (to decentralize; to delegate powers to lower levels)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 將#權力 分散喺唔同嘅組織或人度；權力去中心化 (to decentralise power; to delegate power)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dei6 fong1 fan1 kyun4
examples.translation: decentralisation of power to regional government; devolution

senses.definition: 證明持有人有權進入或享有某種服務嘅憑據，係英文fare嘅音譯（量詞：張） (ticket)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: maai5 fei1
examples.translation: to buy a ticket

senses.definition: 複製一件物品，尤指原品有佢特殊歷史價值或者記念價值，又或者新舊物品之間採用嘅技法唔同製作者唔同時代唔同等等 (to copy; to produce replica)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fong2 zai3 ban2
examples.translation: replica

senses.definition: 好多顏色，或者好多花紋 (coloured; multicoloured)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 tiu4 kwan4 hou2 faa1 aa3!
examples.translation: This skirt is very colourful!

senses.definition: 因為太多顏色或者花紋，令人覺得好混亂、唔舒服 (disorderly; messy)

examples.jyutping: hou2 faa1 aa3! tai2 dou3 ngaan5 dou1 lyun6 saai3!
examples.translation: Wow, this is sensory overload! I can't see things in this chaos.

senses.definition: 有刮痕 (scratched)

examples.jyutping: nei5 faai3 geng3 pin2 faa1 zo2!
examples.translation: Your glasses are scratched.

senses.definition: 污糟；辣撻；有污跡；唔乾淨 (dirty)

examples.jyutping: faa1 min6 maau1
examples.translation: dirty face

senses.definition: 有#污點、#缺憾；之前嘅紀錄唔光彩、唔馨香 (having a bad past history or record)

examples.jyutping: nei5 go3 dai2 hou2 faa1 wo3!
examples.translation: Your record is very poor!

senses.definition: #香煙 嘅量詞 (quantifier for cigarettes)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: wai3, zing2 fei1 jin1 lai4 aa1!
examples.translation: Hey, can I have a cigarette?

senses.definition: #子彈 嘅量詞 (quantifier for bullets)

examples.text: 你條砲得六飛，乜你射得晒我哋咁多人咩？
examples.jyutping: nei5 tiu4 paau3 dak1 luk6 fei1, mat1 nei5 se6 dak1 saai3 ngo5 dei6 gam3 do1 jan4 me1?
examples.translation: Your gun only holds six bullets, how could you possibly hit us all?

senses.definition: 麻雀術語，指#叫糊 嘅時候，只要攞到就可以食糊嘅牌 ((term in mahjong) the tile(s) that one needs to win the hand when one is having a ready hand)

examples.text: 我二五八叫三飛都唔夠佢嚟。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 ji6 ng5 baat3 giu3 saam1 fei1 dou1 m4 gau3 keoi5 lai4.
examples.translation: 2, 5, or 8. I could win if I had either of the three, but he still got it.

senses.definition: 音譯自英文 fashion，原指花樣、花款，後引伸去形容一啲睇唔穿真實意圖嘅動作，或多餘舉動，引起不必要麻煩 ((English loan) fashion, and extended to mean playing tricks, or do unnecessary action that causes troubles)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gaau2 faa1 san2
examples.translation: to make fashion; to make trouble

senses.definition: 火災時可以阻隔濃煙同阻礙火勢蔓延，以延長逃生時間嘅門，通常用於保護走火通道（量詞：道） (fire door; smoke door)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 防煙門後面擺咁多雜物，真係要走起火警上嚟就知味道。
examples.jyutping: fong4 jin1 mun4 hau6 min6 baai2 gam3 do1 zaap6 mat6, zan1 hai6 jiu3 zau2 hei2 fo2 ging2 soeng5 lai4 zau6 zi1 mei6 dou6.
examples.translation: Putting so much stuff behind the fire door is dangerous. If there's a fire, there will be consequences.

senses.definition: 以言論或文字中傷其他人，令到對方嘅利益或聲譽受損；受害者可以採取法律行動向誹謗者索償 (to slander; to libel; to defame)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 而家啲有錢人好惡㗎，你話佢個女考試作弊，隨時俾佢告你誹謗！
examples.translation: Rich people are rather vexatious these days. If you accuse their daughter of cheating in an exam, they may sue you for defamation!

senses.definition: 對#仔女 嘅成績、才藝要求好高嘅#媽媽（量詞：位） (tiger mother; tiger mum)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 意大利車廠 Ferrari S.p.A. 嘅譯名 (Ferrari, an Italian luxury sports car manufacturer)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 出國留學 (to study overseas; to study abroad)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fong3 joeng4 lau4 hok6
examples.translation: to study overseas; to study abroad

senses.definition: #咖啡、#泥土 嘅#顏色 (brown (colour))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 seng4 jat6 dou1 zoek3 fe1 sik1 haai4.
examples.translation: He often wears brown shoes.

senses.definition: 啱啱瞓醒之後又瞓過 (to sleep again just after waking up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 ziu1 faan1 fan3 m4 zi1 seng2.
examples.translation: This morning, I slept again after being woken up, and then I overslept.

senses.definition: 形容生活非常困苦 (deplorable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 一日開十個鐘頭工，真係苦過弟弟。
examples.jyutping: jat1 jat6 hoi1 sap6 go3 zung1 tau4 gung1, zan1 hai6 fu2 gwo3 di4 di2.
examples.translation: Ten hours of work per day makes my day really miserable.

senses.definition: 形容吃喝嫖賭，荒淫腐化嘅生活 (to lead a decadent and dissipated life; literally: to indulge in alcohol and erotica)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢鄉下仔出城，從來都未見過都市花天酒地。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hoeng1 haa2 zai2 ceot1 seng2, cung4 loi4 dou1 mei6 gin3 gwo3 dou1 si2 faa1 tin1 zau2 dei6.
examples.translation: Having grown up in the countryside, he had never experienced the city's vibrant nightlife and indulgences.

senses.definition: 本身係指開槍快嘅槍手，後來借嚟嘲笑一啲男人喺#性行為 開始咗無幾耐就射精，即係#早泄、#派報紙 (man who cums too soon)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我男朋友快槍手嚟，一陣就搞掂，杯麪都未煮熟。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 naam4 pang4 jau5 faai3 coeng1 sau2 lai4, jat1 zan6 zau6 gaau2 dim6, bui1 min6 dou1 mei6 zyu2 suk6.
examples.translation: My boyfriend always finishes quickly during sex. Before my cup of instant noodles is ready to eat.

senses.definition: 狀態（尤其係#體形 或者#體能）好好 ((usually of one's health or body shape) very fit, in great condition; literally: so fit as to be overflowing with oil)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 冇見一排，身形依然fit到漏油喎，點練㗎你？
examples.jyutping: mou5 gin3 jat1 paai4, san1 jing4 ji1 jin4 fit1 dou3 lau6 jau2 wo3, dim2 lin6 gaa3 nei5?
examples.translation: I haven't seen you for some time, and you are still in fantastic shape. What's your secret?

senses.definition: 形容兩個數值之間嘅變化關係，一個增加時另一個減少 (inversely proportional)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 城市富有與普通人成功機會原來成反比。
examples.translation: The richer a city is, the less likely ordinary people are to succeed.

senses.definition: 瘋狂咁飛過去咬一啖，比喻過份或出格嘅行為，貪婪地爭取利益，或可指非禮 (to be over-eager; to be greedy; to be "pushy", to be forward, e.g. in demanding sex on a date)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 兩間公司瘋狂加價，飛擒大咬賺到盡。
examples.jyutping: loeng5 gaan1 gung1 si1 fung1 kwong4 gaa1 gaa3, fei1 kam4 daai6 ngaau5 zaan6 dou3 zeon6.
examples.translation: The two companies have drastically increased their prices and are being greedy to earn every cent.

senses.definition: 餐廳#侍應（量詞：個） (waiter; waitress)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fo2 gei3, m4 goi1 bei2 bui1 seoi2 aa1.
examples.translation: Waiter, please bring me some water.

senses.definition: 一齊做嘢嘅人；多數指#員工、#下屬（量詞：個） (co-worker; staff; employee)

examples.text: 你聽日過嚟我舖頭，我揾個夥記同你跟進下吖。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ting1 jat6 gwo3 lai4 ngo5 pou3 tau2, ngo5 wan2 go3 fo2 gei3 tung4 nei5 gan1 zeon3 haa5 aa1.
examples.translation: Come to my shop tomorrow, and I will ask a colleague to follow up with you.

senses.definition: #警察 之間嘅稱呼（量詞：個） (fellow police officer)

examples.text: 隔籬組有兩個夥記受咗傷，而家唔夠人用，想借調你過去。
examples.jyutping: gaak3 lei4 zou2 jau5 loeng5 go3 fo2 gei3 sau6 zo2 soeng1, ji4 gaa1 m4 gau3 jan4 jung6, soeng2 ze3 diu6 nei5 gwo3 heoi3.
examples.translation: The next squad has two of their men in sickbay. You will be dispatched to their team as they were understaffed.

senses.definition: 微細固體嘅物質（量詞：拃／粒／堆） (powder)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: min6 fan2
examples.translation: flour

senses.definition: 專指一種嘢食；做法係將碎咗嘅天然#澱粉質 食物溝水，搓成一嚿又杰又柔軟嘅物料，再切成指定形狀，加熱而成；通常同啲醬或者湯一齊食（量詞：條） (noodle; pasta)

examples.jyutping: mai5 fan2
examples.translation: rice vermicelli

senses.definition: #白粉；#海洛英（量詞：包） (heroin powder)

examples.text: 呢包粉係喺個犯身上摷到嘅。
examples.jyutping: ni1 baau1 fan2 hai6 hai2 go3 faan2 san1 soeng6 caau3 dou2 ge3.
examples.translation: This pack of heroin was found on the suspect.

senses.definition: #粉底 嘅簡稱；水狀或者粉狀嘅化妝品，搽喺面度調節膚色，遮住毛孔，亦都令搽喺上面嘅其他化妝品更加貼服 (make-up foundation)

examples.text: 你啲粉甩晒嘞，快啲補吓啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 di1 fan2 lat1 saai3 laak3, faai3 di1 bou2 haa2 laa1.
examples.translation: Your makeup has come off. You should touch up your makeup quickly.

senses.definition: #不切實際，冇可能會發生 (absurd; ridiculous; preposterous; describes something that could not possibly happen)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢個世界邊有鬼㗎？真荒謬。
examples.jyutping: nei1 go3 sai3 gaai3 bin1 jau5 gwai2 gaa3? zan1 fong1 mau6.
examples.translation: Do you really believe in ghosts? That's absurd!

senses.definition: 將結構拆散 (to decompose; to disclose)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢隻番梘可以有效分解病毒。
examples.jyutping: nei1 zek3 faan1 gaan2 ho2 ji5 jau5 haau6 fan1 gaai2 beng6 duk6.
examples.translation: This soap is effective at breaking down viruses.

senses.definition: 寄出信件 (to send letters)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 琴晚我哋學生會發信畀校長要求佢辭職。
examples.translation: Last night, the student union sent a letter to the principal calling for his resignation.

senses.definition: 無聲無色、出奇不意咁向敵人開槍 (make a sneak attack using gun; fire a sniper's shot)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 美國總統約翰甘迺迪係被人放冷槍射死嘅。
examples.translation: US president John F.Kennedy was killed by a sniper's shot.

senses.definition: 引伸指響人背後講壞話、暗中害人。近似#放冷箭 (figuratively, to secretly spread rumors or bad information of someone, in order to injure insidiously, to stab one in the back.)

examples.text: 先排有人向佢放冷槍，爆晒佢貪污啲秘聞出嚟
examples.translation: Someone silently betrayed him, and news of his corruption is now widespread.

senses.definition: 因某事件發生而產生嘅動作或行為（量詞：個） (response; reaction)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gwo3 man5 faan2 jing3
examples.translation: allergic reaction

senses.definition: 有錢人唔會持續到三代之後嘅現象。主要係形容二世祖靠上一輩嘅努力，淨係享受而唔識管理屋企，最終令到家道中落。 (wealth in a family cannot be kept till the third generation, describing the youngsters only know how to enjoy the hardship of their seniors but not manage the family, leading to a decline in wealth and family name)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 好心你就上進少少，唔好搞到我哋富不過三代啦！

jyutping: fung1 seoi2 lou2 ngaak1 nei5 sap6 nin4 baat3 nin4

即係#甘草欖。一九六零、七零年代賣欖嘅人背脊孭住欖型嘅容器周圍叫賣。當時啲樓得幾層，買家從露台掟錢落街畀小販，而小販就丟甘草欖上樓畀顧客，因為動作好似放飛機咁，所以就叫飛機欖。 (Licorice Olive, Aeroplane Olive: During the 1960s and the 1970s, hawkers selling licorice olives, carried olive-shaped containers and threw the olives upstairs to the customers. As the action of throwing the olives is similar to that of throwing a paper aeroplane, the licorice olives are also called the aeroplane olive.)

senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一門進行分類嘅方法同科學 (taxonomy)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 遊戲術語；喺角色扮演對陣嘅卡牌遊戲「狼人殺」或者類似遊戲入面，「村民」係最普通嘅角色，冇任何技能，所以有咁嘅嘲諷 ("trash villager", a mockery address for "ordinary villagers", a role in the card game "The Werewolves" and similar games)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 動物名；#熊 屬嘅其中一種 (grizzly bear)
senses.label: 名詞

一組通電後主要用嚟發熱嘅#電線 (heating cable)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #温度 升高，釋放熱力 (to give out heat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 jit6 sin3
examples.translation: heating coils

senses.definition: 一枝幼細嘅#木 棒，頂部嘅易燃物質一經磨擦就會點着，係簡易嘅#生火 工具（量詞：枝／盒） (match, a slender piece of wood that produces fire)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: waak6 fo2 caai4
examples.translation: to light up a match

senses.definition: 線條簡單嘅人像圖案；畫出來嘅身體、手腳都只係一條線，就好似#火柴 咁樣 (stick man)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 所創造嘅物件或者技術（量詞：項／件／個） (invention)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyun1 lei6 faat3 ming4
examples.translation: patented invention

senses.definition: 創造一啲新穎嘅物品或者技術 (to invent)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 ming4 gaa1
examples.translation: inventor

senses.definition: 淺#灰色 (ligh gray colour)
senses.label: 形容詞

#綠色 嘅#玉石 （量詞：嚿／塊） (high-quality jade; darker green colour jade)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 樹幹、咖啡豆嘅顏色 (brown)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: fe1 sik1
examples.translation: brown in colour

senses.definition: #粉紅色 (pink (colour))
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 介乎#紅 同#白 之間嘅顏色 (pink)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam1 jat6 zoek3 fan2 hung4 sik1 kwan4 aa3.
examples.translation: She is wearing a pink dress today.

senses.definition: 溝淡咗嘅黑色 (grey; gray)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: fui1 sik1
examples.translation: grey in colour

senses.definition: 唔開心；心情低落 (sad; melancholic)

examples.jyutping: aai2, hou2 fui1 aa3 gam1 jat6.
examples.translation: Sigh, I'm sad today.

senses.definition: 介乎#黑色 同#白色 之間嘅#顏色，#烏雲、#灰塵 嘅顏色 (gray (colour))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好再着灰色喇，死氣沉沉咁。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 zoi3 zoek3 fui1 sik1 laa3, sei2 hei3 cam4 cam4 gam2.
examples.translation: Don't dress in gray. It makes you look lifeless.

senses.definition: 只要係 (whoever; whatever)
senses.label: 連詞

senses.definition: #開展 一件事 (to initiate; to launch)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 hei2 cim1 meng2 wan6 dung6
examples.translation: to launch a signature campaign

senses.definition: 指表面上係#死對頭，實際上十分之#親熱 嘅夫妻或者情侶 (quarrelsome but loving couple)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 將自己嘅嘢好恭敬噉交畀人 (to present with respect; to contribute or dedicate one's effort)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: mou4 si1 fung6 hin3
examples.translation: selfless contribution

senses.definition: 跌低 (to fall down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: take up the positions of the fallen and rise to fight one after another

senses.definition: 失去控制而釀成危險嘅火焰（量詞：次／場） (fire disaster)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 遇到火災，最緊要係保持冷靜。
examples.jyutping: jyu6 dou2 fo2 zoi1, zeoi3 gan2 jiu3 hai6 bou2 ci4 laang5 zing6.
examples.translation: The most important thing is to remain calm when you encounter a fire disaster.

senses.definition: 扭轉原本劣勢，最後贏出 (to make a comeback (overcoming a disadvantage in a match))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 甲隊喺下半場反勝三比二。
examples.jyutping: gaap3 deoi2 hai2 haa6 bun3 coeng4 faan2 sing3 saam1 bei2 ji6.
examples.translation: Team A made a comeback in the second half and won 3:2.

senses.definition: #輕浮 (frivolous; flighty)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 睇佢花花弗噉，怕唔係幾踏實。
examples.jyutping: tai2 keoi5 faa1 faa1 fit1 gam2, paa3 m4 hai6 gei2 daap6 sat6.
examples.translation: Look how flashy and flighty he is! I'm afraid that he's not very reliable.

senses.definition: 大量工作，要做好多嘢 ((of workload) heavy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 我工務繁重，冇時間陪你玩。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gung1 mou6 faan4 zung6, mou5 si4 gaan3 pui4 nei5 waan2.
examples.translation: I am buried in work and I have no time to play with you.

senses.definition: 矚目嘅公眾人物；享受處於#鎂光燈 之下嘅人；#嘩眾取寵 嘅人 (someone in the public eye; someone who enjoys being in the limelight; attention seeker)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢響中學嗰陣已經係風頭躉嚟，啲學妹排住隊寫情信同送禮物俾佢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hoeng2 zung1 hok6 go2 zan6 ji5 ging1 hai6 fung1 tau4 dan2 lai4, di1 hok6 mui2 paai4 zyu6 deoi2 se2 cing4 seon3 tung4 sung3 lai5 mat6 bei2 keoi5
examples.translation: He has long been a public icon since secondary school, many female junior schoolmates keep sending him love letters and gifts.

senses.definition: （戀愛方面用）女性嘅心 (量詞:個) ((Romantic) woman's heart)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 為咗得到個女仔嘅芳心，阿松送咗九廿九枝玫瑰俾佢，但係最後都係畀佢拒絕咗。
examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 dak1 dou3 go3 neoi5 zai2 ge3 fong1 sam1, aa3 cung4 sung3 zo2 gau2 jaa6 gau2 zi1 mui4 gwai3 bei2 keoi5, daan6 hai6 zeoi3 hau6 dou1 hai6 bei2 keoi5 keoi5 zyut6 zo2.
examples.translation: In order to win the girl's heart, A-chung sent 99 roses to her. Still, he ended up being rejected.

senses.definition: 去分享人哋嘅利益 (to have a share (of profits, benefits, advantage))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢見隔籬舖做老翻生意賺到盆滿缽滿，所以打算照辦煮碗，分一杯羹。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gin3 gaak3 lei4 pou3 zou6 lou5 faan1 saang1 ji3 zaan6 dou3 pun4 mun5 but6 mun5, so2 ji5 daa2 syun3 ziu3 baan2 zyu2 wun2, fan1 jat1 bui1 gang1.
examples.translation: Seeing the neighbouring store has made huge profits by selling knockoffs, he has decided to follow suit in order to have a share of the business.

senses.definition: #花 同#草 嘅合稱 (flower and grass)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: saan1 bo1 soeng6 min6 saang1 mun5 saai3 faa1 cou2.
examples.translation: The flowers and grasses grew all over the hillside.

senses.definition: 敍述嘅時候為後來情節預先埋下嘅#伏線 (foreshadowing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 《紅樓夢》有詩詞做伏筆，暗示人物嘅命運。
examples.jyutping: "hung4 lau4 mung6" jau5 si1 ci4 zou6 fuk6 bat1, am3 si6 jan4 mat6 ge3 ming6 wan6.
examples.translation: In "Dream of the Red Chamber", poetry works were added as foreshadowing to imply the fate of characters.

senses.definition: 由無機化合物合成出嚟嘅化學肥料 （量詞:隻） (chemical fertiliser)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我棵花自從轉咗隻化肥之後，就開始凋謝喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 po1 faa1 zi6 cung4 zyun2 zo2 zek3 faa3 fei4 zi1 hau6, zau6 hoi1 ci2 diu1 ze6 laa3.
examples.translation: When I switched the chemical fertilizer, my flower started to wilt.

senses.definition: 形容一個人嘅財富非常多，足以與一個國家匹敵 (used to describe a person's extreme wealth, which can rival a country's; rich as Croesus)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 撳電腦鍵盤上嘅「F5」掣；引申指重新整理網頁，再載入網頁，揾下內容有冇更新 (to press the "F5" key, a function key on a computer keyboard; figuratively, to reload/refresh a webpage and look for updates)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ef1 ng5 zo2 seng4 maan5 dou1 mou5 liu2 dou3.
examples.translation: I kept refreshing the webpage for an entire night, but got nothing (new).

senses.definition: 將工作交俾唔同嘅人做 (to divide labour; to split up the work)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: laa4 laa4 lam4 fan1 gung1 sin1!
examples.translation: Let's decide on the division of labour right away.

senses.definition: 活捉敵人並且剝奪佢哋嘅自由 (to hold somebody captive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今次行動俘虜咗敵方嘅首腦。
examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 hang4 dung6 fu1 lou5 zo2 dik6 fong1 ge3 sau2 nou5.
examples.translation: We successfully hold the enemy's head as our prisoner.

senses.definition: 引申得到人嘅中意或者歡心 (to capture hearts; to captivate)

examples.text: 我個心已經畀佢俘虜咗。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 sam1 ji5 ging1 bei2 keoi5 fu1 lou5 zo2.
examples.translation: She captured my heart.

senses.definition: 形容#苦瓜、#中藥 等等，難以忍受嘅味道 (bitter)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: fu2 caa4
examples.translation: bitter tea

senses.definition: 艱辛；困難；唔順利 (bitter; difficult; hard)

examples.jyutping: fu2 lin6
examples.translation: to train in a very tough manner

senses.definition: 利用壓縮空氣產生扭力去裝拆各種螺絲嘅氣動工具，常見於機械維修（量詞：支） (pneumatic torque wrench)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 整車師傅舖頭通常都會有支風炮方便做野。
examples.jyutping: zing2 ce1 si1 fu2 pou3 tau2 tung1 soeng4 dou1 wui5 jau5 zi1 fung1 paau3 fong1 bin6 zou6 je5.
examples.translation: Car repairer often has a pneumatic torque wrench in his shop for easing his work.

senses.definition: 利用壓縮空氣產生衝力用嚟掘路嘅氣動工具 (pneumatic jackhammer)

examples.text: 用風炮掘路咁鬼嘈，啲修路工人連耳塞都唔帶個嘅？
examples.jyutping: jung6 fung1 paau3 gwat6 lou6 gam3 gwai2 cou4, di1 sau1 lou6 gung1 jan4 lin4 ji5 sak1 dou1 m4 daai3 go3 ge2?
examples.translation: It is so freaking loud using a jackhammer to dig the road, why those workers don't wear any ear protection?

senses.definition: 燈光黯淡 (dim; dusky)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 公園嘅燈光昏暗，最適合賊人埋伏。
examples.jyutping: gung1 jyun2 ge3 dang1 gwong1 fan1 am3, zeoi3 sik1 hap6 caak6 jan4 maai4 fuk6.
examples.translation: The dim light makes the park the best place for thieves to ambush their victims.

senses.definition: 有錢男人 （量詞：個／位／名） (wealthy man)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baak3 maan6 fu3 jung1
examples.translation: millionaire

senses.definition: 激發起人嘅思考、深刻反省，令人有所得着 (thought-provoking; to set people thinking)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢呢番説話語重心長，發人深省。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ni1 faan1 syut3 waa6 jyu5 zung6 sam1 coeng4, faat3 jan4 sam1 sing2.
examples.translation: His words are earnest enough to prompt one to deep thought.

senses.definition: 形容事情瑣碎而且唔重要但又相當複雜 (loaded with excessive trivialities)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢樣樣嘢都要親力親為，幾繁瑣嘅嘢都要做。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 joeng6 joeng6 je5 dou1 jiu3 can1 lik6 can1 wai4, gei2 faan4 so2 ge3 je5 dou1 jiu3 zou6.
examples.translation: He wants to do everything by himself, no matter how trivial it is.

senses.definition: 魚類死亡 (to die, usually used to describe fishes; to go belly up)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 tiu4 jyu2 faan2 zo2 tou5.
examples.translation: My fish is dead.

senses.definition: 反轉身體，肚向天 (to turn upside down)

examples.jyutping: gaa3 ce1 caan2 soeng5 sek6 bok3 faan2 zo2 tou5.
examples.translation: The car runs into the barrier and turns upside down.

senses.definition: 插花用品；用酚醛樹脂發泡整成，可以將磚狀切割做唔同形狀，喺底部固定同支撐花卉；鮮花專用嘅會易啲吸水，好似#海綿 噉 (floral foam)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sap1 faa1 nai4
examples.translation: wet floral foam

senses.definition: 適合於#種植 嘅#泥土 (garden soil or potting soil)
對#空姐 嘅貶稱，指控佢哋性生活隨便（量詞：個／隻） (derogatory term for female flight attendants, with an accusation of their easy attitude in sex life)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 令人提唔起#興致 (dry and dull; uninteresting)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 阿松寫嘅故仔真係好枯燥。
examples.jyutping: aa3 cung4 se2 ge3 gu2 zai2 zan1 hai6 hou2 fu1 cou3.
examples.translation: The stories written by Ah-Chung are so dry and dull.

senses.definition: 極度渴求錢 (to be obsessed with money)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 劉生佢發錢寒㗎，俾錢佢佢就乜都肯做。
examples.jyutping: lau4 saang1 keoi5 faat3 cin2 hon4 gaa3, bei2 cin2 keoi5 keoi5 zau6 mat1 dou1 hang2 zou6.
examples.translation: Mr Lau is obsessed with money. He is willing to do anything for it.

senses.definition: 一種打印同掃描文字、圖片或影像，透過#電話線 傳送同接收嘅機器（量詞：部） (fax machine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: bou6 fek1 si2 gei1 mou5 saai3 zi2, sau1 m4 dou2 fek1 si2 aa3
examples.translation: The fax machine has run out of paper, so it can't take incoming faxes at the moment.

senses.definition: 中止政策或者措施 (to abolish)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔合理嘅政策就應該廢止。
examples.jyutping: m4 hap6 lei5 ge3 zing3 caak3 zau6 jing1 goi1 fai3 zi2.
examples.translation: It's reasonable to abolish unreasonable policies.

senses.definition: 喺空中飄來飄去，好似喺度跳舞噉 (to dance in the air; to flutter)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: syu6 jip6 hai2 bun3 hung1 fei1 mou5.
examples.translation: The leaves are dancing in the air.

senses.definition: 佛教用語，指抽象或者具體嘅現象同事物 ((Buddhism) dhárma; abstract or concrete nature of a phenomenon or thing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 cai3 faat3 ge3 sat6 soeng3 zau6 hai6 hung1.
examples.translation: The nature of everything is emptiness.

senses.definition: 好㷫；好嬲；令到你好想對住搞到你嬲個樣嘢、嗰人大嗌，甚至係破壞、傷害佢嘅一個感覺 (furious to be enraged or deeply irritated)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 提番呢件事嘅時候，佢重係好火滾。
examples.jyutping: tai4 faan1 ni1 gin6 si6 ge3 si4 hau6, keoi5 zung6 hai6 hou2 fo2 gwan2.
examples.translation: When someone mentioned this matter, he would still be furious.

senses.definition: 鎖定一件事物，非常希望可以得到佢 (like a tiger intently keeping an eye on its prey; to be inquisitive towards something; to eye something as if it is a prey)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢位富翁嘅仔女對佢嘅遺產虎視眈眈。
examples.jyutping: ni1 wai2 fu3 jung1 ge3 zai2 neoi2 deoi3 keoi5 ge3 wai4 caan2 fu2 si6 daam1 daam1.
examples.translation: The children of this tycoon are greedily eyeing his inheritance.

senses.definition: 經過準備之後出現喺大眾嘅面前 (to appear on the market)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 今個秋天，iPhone 6S 將會粉墨登場。
examples.jyutping: gam1 go3 cau1 tin1, ai1 fung1 luk6 es zoeng1 wui6 fan2 mak6 dang1 coeng4.
examples.translation: This fall, iPhone 6S will be available on the market.

senses.definition: 將啲中藥煎第二次；將沏過嘅茶葉曬乾炒過，重新製作 (to decoct the herbal medicine for a second time; to redo the tea leaves which has been brewed)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 啲藥要翻渣煲第二次先得㗎！
examples.jyutping: di1 joek6 jiu3 faan1 zaa1 bou1 dai6 ji6 ci3 sin1 dak1 gaa3!
examples.translation: The herbal medicine needs to decoct twice!

senses.definition: 令人覺得苦悶或者煩躁 (to annoy; to trouble; to bother)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你做乜係都要煩住我啫？
examples.jyutping: nei5 zou6 mat1 hai6 dou1 jiu3 faan4 zyu6 ngo5 ze1?
examples.translation: Why do you keep bothering me?

senses.definition: #拖累 其他人嘅負擔 (burden; hindrance; impediment)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我媽媽擔心佢個病會成為我嘅負累。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 maa4 maa1 daam1 sam1 keoi5 go3 beng6 wui5 sing4 wai4 ngo5 ge3 fu6 leoi6.
examples.translation: My mother worries that her illness will make her become a burden to me.

senses.definition: 低密度#聚苯乙烯 膠（加咗發泡劑），入面有好多微細嘅氣泡，造成輕身、有彈性、隔熱同有浮力嘅物料，用嚟包裝、隔熱 (styrofoam; polystyrene foam)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 支持環保，減少使用發泡膠。
examples.jyutping: zi1 ci4 waan4 bou2, gaam2 siu2 si2 jung6 faat3 pou5 gaau1.
examples.translation: Support environmental protection and use less styrofoam.

senses.definition: 除衫 (to take off clothes)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當眾寬衣解帶係犯法㗎！
examples.jyutping: dong1 zung3 fun1 ji1 gaai2 daai2 hai6 faan6 faat3 gaa3!
examples.translation: Taking off clothes in public is illegal.

senses.definition: 一貫嘅做事方式或者手法（量詞：種） (style; manner; mode)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: go3 jan4 fung1 gaak3
examples.translation: personal style

senses.definition: #功能 (function, the natural purpose of something)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 部新手機有好多特別嘅function。
examples.jyutping: bou6 san1 sau2 gei1 jau5 hou2 do1 dak6 bit6 ge3 fan1 seon4.
examples.translation: This new mobile phone has many special functions.

senses.definition: 社交場合、活動 (function; social event)

examples.text: 公司又有function要搞，睇嚟又有排忙喇。
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 jau6 jau5 fan1 seon4 jiu3 gaau2, tai2 lai4 jau6 jau5 paai4 mong4 laa3.
examples.translation: There is a function again that we need to host. It seems that we will be busy for some time.

senses.definition: #函數 ((of mathematics) function)

examples.text: y等於x二次係唔係一個function呢？
examples.jyutping: waai1 dang2 jyu4 iks1 ji6 ci3 hai6 m4 hai6 jat1 go3 fan1 seon4 ne1?
examples.translation: Is y=x² a function or not?

senses.definition: 噴灑；向周圍飛射；#濺 (to splash over; to spray)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: seoi2 hau4 di1 seoi2 fet6 saai3 ceot1 lei4.
examples.translation: The tap is splashing water all over.

senses.definition: 一啲本身應該喺入面嘅嘢，因為各種原因而周圍外露 (to be loose, exposed, or dispersed (when it should be properly folded, contained or organized))

examples.text: 件衫攝得唔好，所以而家fet晒出嚟。
examples.jyutping: gin6 saam1 sip3 dak1 m4 hou2, so2 ji5 ji4 gaa1 fet6 saai3 ceot1 lei4.
examples.translation: The shirt is not tucked in properly, so the bottom part is sticking out.

senses.definition: 唔#開胃、冇食慾、想嘔 (nauseous; queasy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: ling6 jan4 faan2 wai6
examples.translation: nauseating; disgusting

senses.definition: 指人因為#嬲 而表現得#衝動 #魯莽。 (to act recklessly because of anger, to lose temper)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔見咗嘢咪慢慢揾囉，發茅都無用㗎。
examples.jyutping: m4 gin3 zo2 je5 mai6 maan6 maan2 wan2 lo1, faat3 maau4 dou1 mou5 jung6 gaa3.
examples.translation: If you can't find something you need to search with patience, acting recklessly gives no help at all.

senses.definition: 或指為咗得到某啲嘢，不顧一切、#不擇手段 咁去做 (to be very desperate for something)

examples.text: 佢一到考試前一個月就會發晒茅係咁温書。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 dou3 haau2 si5 cin4 jat1 go3 jyut6 zau6 wui5 faat3 saai3 maau4 hai6 gam2 wan1 syu1.
examples.translation: He studies extremely hard a month before every examination.

senses.definition: 對照某樣事物以認清地理位置嘅指標，例如係#前#後#左#右，或者#東#南#西#北（量詞：個） (direction; orientation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fong1 hoeng3 zing3 kok3
examples.translation: in the right direction

senses.definition: 引申指對未來嘅打算、目標 (general aim or purpose)

examples.text: 青少年容易迷失方向， 誤入歧途。
examples.jyutping: cing1 siu3 nin4 jung4 ji3 mai4 sat1 fong1 hoeng3, ng6 jap6 kei4 tou4.
examples.translation: Young people can easily lose their way and go astray.

senses.definition: 對成日煩住晒嘅人嘅蔑稱（量詞：條） (vermin; derogatory title for annoying people)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jau6 hai6 ni1 tiu4 faan4 gaau1! mai6 gaau2 aa3!
examples.translation: It's this vermin again! Not again!

senses.definition: 形容某樣嘢令到一件事或工作容易完成 (convenient; handy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: fong1 bin6 kwai4 daai3
examples.translation: easy to bring

senses.definition: 代替#可以；比較委婉 (be able to; can)

examples.text: 借錢？我而家手頭唔方便。
examples.jyutping: ze3 cin2? ngo5 ji4 gaa1 sau2 tau4 m4 fong1 bin6.
examples.translation: Want to borrow money? I am currently not able to lend it though.

senses.definition: 去返啱啱出發嘅地方、原來嘅地方；返去起點、源頭；#回程 (to go back; to return)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jiu3 faan1 zyun3 tau2 lo2 baa2 ze1.
examples.translation: I'll have to go back for my umbrella.

senses.definition: 令到一個人變返好，做返好人，向返良善嘅方面發展；#改邪歸正 (to lead a person back into a good way)

examples.text: 你而家改過嘅話，仲可以返轉頭做番個好人。
examples.jyutping: nei5 ji4 gaa1 goi2 gwo3 ge3 waa2, zung6 ho2 ji5 faan1 zyun3 tau4 zou6 faan1 go3 hou2 jan4.
examples.translation: If you change now, you can still become a good person again.

senses.definition: 一個組織喺另一個地方建立嘅部分（量詞：個） (branch; division)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cit3 laap6 fan1 bou6
examples.translation: to set up a branch

senses.definition: 剝咗殼嘅花生，花生米、花生仁 (shelled peanut; peanut kernel)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 舞曲節拍快夾勁嘅夜總會或#的士高 (rave club; rave disco)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 揈頭場成日有人吸毒打交。
examples.jyutping: fing6 tau4 coeng4 seng4 jat6 jau5 jan4 kap1 duk6 daa2 gaau1.
examples.translation: Drugs and fights are common at rave discos.

senses.definition: 傳説生物，據講同生魚一樣樣，但係有四隻腳，食咗會全身啲骨溶晒噉死（量詞：條／隻） (a legendary creature that looks exactly like a snakehead but with four legs, which is said to be deadly poisonous if mistakenly eaten as it can "dissolve one's bones"; literally "bone-dissolving dragon")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 對未自立嘅仔女嘅戲稱，用嚟強調養大佢哋好辛苦（量詞：隻／班） (child; dependant child; used to emphasise the hardship in bringing up the child(ren))

examples.text: 隻化骨龍仲細嗰陣，就望佢快啲大；到佢真係大個嘞，又有啲唔捨得。
examples.jyutping: zek3 faa3 gwat1 lung4 zung6 sai3 go2 zan2, zau6 mong6 keoi5 faai3 di1 daai6, dou3 keoi5 zan1 hai6 daai6 go3 laak3, jau6 jau5 di1 m4 se2 dak1.
examples.translation: When the "bone-dissolving dragon" was still a kid, I wanted him to grow up faster; now that he is grown-up, and I miss that time.

senses.definition: 日式、韓式餐廳隨意#任食 嘅套餐 (All-you-can-eat, especially at Japanese or Korean restaurants)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好耐冇食日本嘢，不如我哋今晚去食放題囉。
examples.jyutping: hou2 noi6 mou5 sik6 jat6 bun2 je5, bat1 jyu4 ngo5 dei6 gam1 maan5 heoi3 sik6 fong3 tai4 lo3.
examples.translation: It has been ages since we've last had Japanese food. How about going for some Japanese all-you-can-eat tonight?

senses.definition: 表面友善但係心底裏陰險或者有機心 (used to describe a person who seems nice and friendly yet malicious from the bottom of heart)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唔好睇佢成日笑騎騎啊，其實佢好腹黑㗎。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 tai2 keoi5 sing4 jat6 siu3 ke4 ke4 aa3, kei4 sat6 keoi5 hou2 fuk1 haak1 gaa3.
examples.translation: Don't be deceived by her usual smile. She is in fact quite malicious.

senses.definition: 喺一個地方持續出現嘅病症（量詞：個） (endemic disease)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 要喺一個地方做醫生，首先要對嗰笪地方嘅風土病有基本嘅認識，例如香港人好常見嘅蠶豆症，喺英國畢業嘅醫生，就未必識嘞。
examples.jyutping: jiu3 hai2 jat1 go3 dei6 fong1 zou6 ji1 sang1, sau2 sin1 jiu3 deoi3 go2 daat3 dei6 fong1 ge3 fung1 tou2 beng6 jau5 gei1 bun2 ge3 jing6 sik1, lai6 jyu4 hoeng1 gong2 jan4 hou2 soeng4 gin3 ge3 caam4 dau2 zing3, hai2 jing1 gwok3 bat1 jip6 ge3 ji1 sang1, zau6 mei6 bit1 sik1 laak3.
examples.translation: To be a doctor in a locality, one must first know the endemic diseases there. For example, favism, though rather common in Hong Kong, is not common knowledge among UK graduates.

senses.definition: 根據一堆人或嘢嘅特質編配佢哋去唔同地方 (to diverge; to triage; to distribute)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 醫管局已經採取分流措施，處理急症室嘅病人。
examples.jyutping: ji1 gun2 guk2 ji5 ging1 coi2 ceoi2 fan1 lau4 cou3 si1, cyu5 lei5 gap1 zing3 sat1 ge3 beng6 jan4.
examples.translation: The Hospital Authority has implemented triage measures in dealing with patients in the emergency room.

senses.definition: 重覆去做或者選擇某樣嘢 (to repeat an action or a choice)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 最近嗰間公司又翻兜佢以前啲飲品包裝喇。
examples.jyutping: zeoi3 gan6 go2 gaan1 gung1 si1 jau6 faan1 dau1 keoi5 ji5 cin4 di1 jam2 ban2 baau1 zong1 laa3.
examples.translation: These days the company is adopting the old packaging of their drinks.

senses.definition: 特指重新開展情侶關係；情侶#復合；#翻撻 ((for ex-lovers) to get back together)

examples.text: 咁多年嚟，佢哋都好後悔一時衝動而分手，仲係好掛住對方，好想翻兜。
examples.jyutping: gam3 do1 nin4 lai4, keoi5 dei6 dou1 hou2 hau6 fui3 jat1 si4 cung1 dung6 ji4 fan1 sau2, zung6 hai6 hou2 gwaa3 zyu6 deoi3 fong1, hou2 soeng1 faan1 dau1.
examples.translation: In these years, they have regretted breaking up impulsively; they still miss each other and want to get back together.

senses.definition: 從源頭解決問題 (Literally, take away the firewood under the cooking pot, meaning to address the root cause of a problem.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個城市人滿為患，唯有釜底抽薪，控制人口，先可以解決問題。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 sing4 si5 jan4 mun5 wai4 waan6, wai4 jau5 fu2 dai2 cau1 san1, hung3 zai3 jan4 hau2, sin1 ho2 ji5 gaai2 kyut3 man6 tai4.
examples.translation: Overpopulation of this city can only be solved by addressing its root cause - controlling population.

senses.definition: 原封不動噉影印某啲書刊 (to photocopy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢本嘢係翻印㗎，唔好買啦。
examples.jyutping: ni1 bun2 je5 hai6 faan1 jan3 gaa3, m4 hou2 maai5 laa1.
examples.translation: This is a photocopied version. Don't buy it.

senses.definition: 形容一個人瞓覺起身之後覺得膊頭同頸嘅肌肉痛、唔舒服，多數係因為瞓嘅姿勢唔啱 (to have a stiff neck or a crick in the neck, usually caused by an awkward sleeping posture)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我今日瞓戾頸，工作效率大減。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 jat6 fan3 lai2 geng2, gung1 zok3 haau6 leot2 daai6 gaam2.
examples.translation: I've been having a stiff neck the whole day, reducing my productivity greatly.

senses.definition: 長期離開、分離 (to separate or part for a long time)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 闊別多年，終於可以同屋企人團聚。
examples.jyutping: fut3 bit6 do1 nin4, zung1 jyu1 ho2 ji5 tung4 uk1 kei5 jan4 tyun4 zeoi6.
examples.translation: After years of separation, I can reunite with my family.

senses.definition: 形容人牢騷滿腹，態度唔好 (to be grumpy; literally: negative air)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢咁負氣，人哋睇見就怕。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gam3 fu6 hei3, jan4 dei6 tai2 gin3 zau6 paa3.
examples.translation: He's so grumpy that everyone is scared when they see him.

senses.definition: #法老王 (Pharaoh)
senses.label: 名詞

phonetic.original: fan1 tau4 hang4 si6:fan1 tau4 haang4 si6

senses.definition: 同一班人分開行兩條路，引伸成各自努力完成目標 (to separate and go in different directions; literally, to split up on two different roads)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 我哋不如分頭行事：你哋去買禮物，我哋就去攞生日蛋糕。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 bat1 jyu4 fan1 tau4 hang4 si6: nei5 dei6 heoi3 maai5 lai5 mat6, ngo5 dei6 zau6 heoi3 lo2 saang1 jat6 daan6 gou1.
examples.translation: Why don't we split up and do different things—you go and buy the gift and we'll get the birthday cake.

keywords: fan1 tau4 hang4 si6:fan1 tau4 haang4 si6

senses.definition: 用嚟擺#花 嘅#樽（量詞：個） (vase)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 早兩日我喺廣州買咗個廣彩花樽，好靚。
examples.jyutping: zou2 loeng5 jat6 ngo5 hai2 gwong2 zau1 maai5 zo2 go3 gwong2 coi2 faa1 zeon1, hou2 leng3.
examples.translation: Two days ago, I bought a Canton porcelain vase in Gwongzau. It's beautiful.

senses.definition: 得人歡心但未必係真嘅話語 (sweet but insincere words; honeyed words)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 花花公子淨係識講花言巧語嚟𠱁女仔。
examples.jyutping: faa1 faa1 gung1 zi2 zing6 hai6 sik1 gong2 faa1 jin4 haau2 jyu5 lai4 tam3 neoi5 zai2.
examples.translation: Playboys only know how to please girls with honeyed words.

senses.definition: 寬容、大方噉原諒其他人嘅錯誤 (to forgive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我唔奢求你寬恕我，只要你以後開心就得喇。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 ce1 kau4 nei5 fun1 syu3 ngo5, zi2 jiu3 nei5 ji5 hau6 hoi1 sam1 zau6 dak1 laa3.
examples.translation: I don't hold out much hope that you will forgive me, I just want you to live happily hereafter.

senses.definition: 唔做應承咗人嘅嘢；唔 #守信用 (to go back on one's words or promises)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 應承咗就要做，冇得反悔㗎！
examples.jyutping: jing1 sing4 zo2 zau6 jiu3 zou6, mou5 dak1 faan2 fui3 gaa3.
examples.translation: If you promised then you need to do it, you can't go back on you word.

senses.definition: 手嘅前臂大幅度移動；可以係空手或者揸住一啲嘢 (to wave; to swing)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fai1 sau2
examples.translation: to wave one's hands

senses.definition: 用#花 裝飾過嘅#籃，多數用於恭賀場合（量詞：個） (basket of flowers; usually for special occasions)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 好多人送花籃嚟賀我哋新店開張。
examples.jyutping: hou2 do1 jan4 sung3 faa1 laam2 lai4 ho6 ngo5 dei6 san1 dim3 hoi1 zoeng1.
examples.translation: Many friends sent us flower baskets to celebrate the opening of our new shop.

senses.definition: 大風同大雪嘅天氣（量詞：場） (snowstorm)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 coeng4 daai6 fung1 syut3 gei2 si4 jyun4?
examples.translation: When will the snowstorm end?

senses.definition: 一啲一早已經存在，但係之前未知而新揾到嘅嘢（量詞：個） (finding; discovery)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢個發現對我哋嘅研究好有幫助。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 faat3 jin6 deoi3 ngo5 dei6 ge3 jin4 gau3 hou2 jau5 bong1 zo6.
examples.translation: This finding is very useful for our research.

senses.definition: 除咗#主體 之後仲帶有 (to be available with)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 室外網球場附設射燈，噉樣夜晚都打得波。
examples.jyutping: sat1 ngoi6 mong5 kau4 coeng4 fu6 cit3 se6 dang1, gam2 joeng2 je6 maan5 dou1 daa2 dak1 bo1.
examples.translation: Lighting is available at the outdoor tennis court, enabling playing at night time.

senses.definition: [ChatGPT]味道#苦潮潮、#澀口；形容事物#艱難、#痛苦 ([ChatGPT]bitter and astringent in taste; describing something that is difficult and painful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: [ChatGPT]這杯咖啡喝起來#苦澀 得讓人無法入口。
examples.jyutping: ze6 bui1 ka1 fe1 he1 hei2 loi4 fu2 jan4 mou4 faat3 jap6 hau2.
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]This cup of coffee tastes so bitter and astringent that it's hard to swallow.

senses.definition: 比喻不快、痛苦嘅心情 (metaphor for bitter and painful emotions)

examples.translation: Even bitterness can become beauty.

senses.definition: 係一種#鈴，可以喺風吹下，同其他物體碰撞發出聲音 (wind chime)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 日本人覺得風鈴可以帶嚟好運。
examples.jyutping: jat6 bun2 jan4 gok3 dak1 fung1 ling4 ho2 ji5 dai3 lai4 hou2 wan6.
examples.translation: The Japanese believe wind chimes can bring people good luck.

senses.definition: 形容事件可笑，冇可能發生 (absurd; laughable;ridiculous)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 明明冇落雨擔乜嘢遮啫，真係荒唐。
examples.jyutping: ming4 ming4 mou5 lok6 jyu5 daam1 mat1 je5 ze1 zek1, zan1 hai6 fong1 tong4.
examples.translation: Why do you hold an umbrella when there is no rain? It's ridiculous.

senses.definition: 形容人傻傻哋、唔正常、精神錯亂，好似#揩 咗嘢咁 (lunatic, mad, schizophrenic, as if high on drugs)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 無啦啦叫我借十皮比佢，佢都忽忽地嘅！
examples.jyutping: mou4 laa1 laa1 giu3 ngo5 ze3 sap6 pei4 bei2 keoi5, keoi5 dou1 fat1 fat1 dei2 ge3!
examples.translation: He's gone mad! He all of a sudden asked me to lend him a hundred thousand dollars.

senses.definition: 已經死咗嘅人類剩返嘅骨頭，通常係指已經枯乾咗嘅白骨（量詞：副） (skeletons and skulls or dead bodies)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 大家快啲tag嗰啲食極都仲係好瘦嘅朋友，叫佢哋今年萬聖節扮骷髏骨得啦。
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 faai3 di1 tek1 go2 di1 sik6 gik6 dou1 zung6 hai6 hou2 sau3 ge3 pang4 jau5, giu3 keoi5 dei6 gam1 nin2 maan6 sing3 zit3 baan6 fu1 lou4 gwat1 dak1 laa1.
examples.translation: For those who never gain weight no matter how much they have eaten, tell them to cosplay skeletons in Halloween this year!

senses.definition: 調情、挑逗 (to flirt)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你唔係有女朋友喇咩？仲喺度flirt女？
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hai6 jau5 neoi5 pang4 jau5 laa3 me1? zung6 hai2 dou6 foet1 neoi2?
examples.translation: Don't you have a girlfriend? Why are you still flirting girls?

senses.definition: 冚喺傷口嘅物料嘅統稱，用嚟保護傷口，防止細菌感染同吸收傷口滲出嚟嘅液體；包括紗布、膠布等等（量詞：塊） (wound dressing)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 啲血滲晒出嚟喇，快啲去冚塊新敷料！
examples.jyutping: di1 hyut3 sam3 saai3 ceot1 lai4 laa3, faai3 di1 heoi3 kam2 faai3 san1 fu1 liu2!
examples.translation: Blood is seeping through the wound dressing! Quickly place a new one on top!

senses.definition: 產品嘅#顏色、#用料、#性能、#外形 等等嘅配搭，每種配搭都可以叫一個款式（量詞：種／隻） (style; pattern; design; model; often referring to a category of product with a specific design or look)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢批新鞋有好多唔同嘅款式。
examples.jyutping: ni1 pai1 san1 haai4 jau5 hou2 do1 m4 tung4 ge3 fun2 sik1.
examples.translation: This batch of new shoes is released with a number of distinct styles.

senses.definition: 物質喺使用嘅時候嘅數目 (amount or weight in use)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我剩係煮咗一個人份量咋喎。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zing6 hai6 zyu2 zo2 jat1 go3 jan4 fan6 loeng6 zaa3 wo3.
examples.translation: I've prepared just enough food for myself only.

senses.definition: 一樣嘢嘅表面或者入面好油膩，通常指食物 (greasy, usually used to describe foodstuff)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢舊#東坡肉 太多肥膏，肥淰淰咁點擺入口呀？
examples.jyutping: ni1 gau6 dung1 bo1 juk6 taai3 do1 fei4 gou1, fei4 nam6 nam6 gam2 dim2 baai2 jap6 hau2 aa3?
examples.translation: This piece of Dongpo pork is too fatty. How can I bring myself to ingest something this greasy?

senses.definition: 即係#影印 (to duplicate; to copy or photocopy)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 唔該將呢份文件複印十份。

keywords: faan6 man4 zyu2 paai3:faan6 man4 zyu2 paai1

senses.definition: #泛民主派 嘅簡稱 (pro-democracy camp, abbreviation of #泛民主派)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #變壓器 (transformer)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 泛指電子產品嘅充電器或者電源 (charger or AC adapter in general)

examples.text: 部電腦冇電，又唔記得帶火牛。
examples.jyutping: bou6 din6 nou5 mou5 din6, jau6 m4 gei3 dak1 daai3 fo2 ngau4.
examples.translation: My computer is out of battery, and I forgot to bring the charger.

senses.definition: 女性小陰唇(皮瓣)外翻現象,又稱「反晒皮」 (inner labia (minova) that stick out and hang beyond the outer labia (majora))

examples.text: 原來我女神下面反晒西皮
examples.translation: my dream girl's cuntlips are actually sticking out

senses.definition: 歇後語，下半句係「#多嚿魚」，粗口「#多鳩餘」嘅諧音 (the first part of a "sandwich pun", which literally means "French feast", the second part of it is 多嚿魚 do1 gau6 jyu2 (one fish too many), which is a near homophone of 多鳩餘 do1 gau1 jyu4 "un-fucking-necessary")
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 一種將小型#螺絲 固定喺#牆 上嘅零件 (screw plastic anchor)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一個因為冇埋口而形成嘅窄小空間 (crack; gap)

senses.definition: 由幾樣比較細嘅物件而組成嘅嘢 (set; pack)

examples.translation: a pack of cards

senses.definition: 重覆動作 (to imitate; to copy)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: fong2 haau6
examples.translation: to follow

senses.definition: 複製 (replicated)

examples.jyutping: fong2 zan1
examples.translation: to resemble

senses.definition: 橫向長度高 (wide; broad)

examples.jyutping: tiu4 lou6 hou2 fut3.
examples.translation: This road is really wide.

senses.definition: 有錢而且唔吝嗇 (wealthy; rich)

senses.definition: 形容女性體型偏大，又未至於肥；含褒義 ((of the female figure) full and round; well-developed; hourglass figure)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 san1 coi4 fung1 mun5, go3 joeng2 jau6 leng3.
examples.translation: She has a well-shaped figure and a pretty face.

senses.definition: 好多嘢做；無空閒時間 (busy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: faan4 mong4 si4 gaan1
examples.translation: peak hour

senses.definition: 違反規則 (to break the rules or regulations, esp. in the sports game)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 leoi5 ci3 faan6 kwai1, zung1 jyu1 bei6 fat6 lei4 coeng4

senses.definition: #升幅 好大 (to leap; to advance greatly)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: zung1 gwok3 ging1 zai3 gan6 nin4 lai4 fei1 joek3 zang1 coeng2.
examples.translation: The economy of China has advanced greatly in recent years.

senses.definition: #宣傳#口號，表示做得好、#進步、#領先 (used in the slogan, to outperform, improve, leap)
死咗之後以同一個軀殼重新獲得生命 (to bring back to life; to revive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fuk6 wut6 zit3
examples.translation: Easter

senses.definition: 驚、擔心 (to fear; to be concerned)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: nei5 gam3 gon2 zou6 me1 ze1. nei5 fong1 jan4 dei6 m4 dang2 nei5 me1?
examples.translation: Why are you in a hurry? Why do you worry that they won't wait for you?

senses.definition: 將分別揾出嚟，介定佢同另外一啲嘢之間嘅唔同 (to distinguish; to differentiate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fan1 bin6 si6 fei1
examples.translation: to differentiate between right and wrong

senses.definition: 身體因為恐懼、緊張、寒冷或者憤怒而抖動 ((body) to shake because one is frightened, nervous, cold or angry)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢度實在太凍喇，大家都喺度打冷震。
examples.jyutping: ni1 dou6 sat6 zoi6 taai3 dung3 laa3, daai6 gaa1 dou1 hai2 dou6 daa2 laang5 zan3.
examples.translation: It's too cold here. Everyone is shaking.

senses.definition: 形容物質充足 (prosperous; well-off)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢家境好富裕，住洋樓養番狗。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gaa1 ging2 hou2 fu3 jyu6, zyu6 joeng4 lau2 joeng5 faan1 gau2.
examples.translation: He and his rich family live in a western-style family and keeps an exotic dog.

senses.definition: 講好多嘢去説服人 (to spend a lot of effort in attempt to convince someone)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我哋費盡唇舌，都係想管理層收返呢個決定。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 fai3 zeon6 seon4 sit3, dou1 hai6 soeng2 gun2 lei5 cang4 sau1 faan1 ni1 go3 kyut3 ding6.
examples.translation: We spend a lot of effort in order to convince the management to withdraw this decision.

senses.definition: 裝飾用嘅圖案、紋理（量詞:隻/個） (decorative patterns)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zoeng1 zi2 di1 faa1 man5 hou2 leng3.

senses.definition: 用嚟化粧嘅架生（量詞:件/樽/支/盒） (cosmetics; makeup)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢每個月用一半月薪嚟買化妝品。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mui5 go3 jyut6 jung6 jat1 bun3 jyut6 san1 lai4 maai5 faa3 zong1 ban2.
examples.translation: He spends half of his wage on cosmetics.

senses.definition: 再做多次一個動作或者行為 (to repeat an action)

examples.jyutping: fuk1 seot6

senses.definition: 用鹼性物同油製成嘅一塊固體，用嚟沖涼或者清潔（量詞：塊） (soap)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jung6 faan1 gaan2 cung1 loeng4.

examples.jyutping: dim2 gaai2 dei6 haa2 jau5 gam3 do1 faa1 faan2 ge3?

senses.definition: 釋放束縛 (to let go; to release; to detach)

senses.definition: 思想開放、唔會執着於某啲嘢 (open-minded; enlightened; liberal; thorough; tolerant)

senses.definition: 睇落好#驚青 ((of appearance) frightened; anxious)

senses.definition: #戰爭 中由#守衞、#建築物、自然屏障等連起一個範圍嘅#邊界，亦用嚟形容#運動 比賽中防守方嘅部署（量詞：條／道） (line of defense)

senses.definition: 查核某樣資訊係咪事實 (to fact-check)
