examples.text: 網上有好多未fact check嘅資訊，我哋要好小心。
examples.jyutping: mong5 soeng6 jau5 hou2 do1 mei6 fek1 cek1 ge3 zi1 seon3, ngo5 dei6 jiu3 hou2 siu2 sam1.
examples.translation: There is a lot of information not yet fact-checked on the Internet. We should be very careful.

senses.definition: 委婉指#基督徒 之死 (to go home to heaven; an euphemism to refer to the death of a Christian)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 將條狀物件沿住特定軌跡咁郁、#揮動 (to fling; to swing; XXXXXXX)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fik6 sing2

senses.definition: 形容健美嘅身型、狀態好 (physically fit)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢男友係運動健將，身形好fit。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 naam4 jau5 hai6 wan6 dung6 gin6 zoeng3, san1 jing4 hou2 fit1.
examples.translation: Her boyfriend is good at sports and very fit.

senses.definition: 適合 (suitable)

examples.jyutping: nei5 zoek3 nei1 gin6 saam1 fit1 saai3.
examples.translation: This shirt suits you.

senses.definition: 透過#fax機 傳送、接收嘅文件或者圖像（量詞：張／份） (fax; facsimile)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我每個月收到一千張fax，有九百張係廣告嚟嘅。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 mui5 go3 jyut6 sau1 dou2 jat1 cin1 zoeng1 fek1 si2, jau5 gau2 baak3 zoeng1 hai6 gwong2 gou3 lai4 ge3.
examples.translation: I receive 1000 faxes every month, and 900 of which are advertisments.

senses.definition: 兩面都煎過嘅半熟荷包#蛋 (over-easy egg; eggs that are fried on both sides, but the second side is not cooked for very long, so the yolk stays runny.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 香港警察「有組織罪案及三合會調查科」嘅俗稱；專門調查同埋打擊有組織罪案以及三合會罪案 (anti-triad squad)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 迷幻劑麥角酰二乙胺 (lysergic acid diethylamide; LSD)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 變成，轉變為，分解為 (to become; to be transformed to; to be dissolved into)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faa3 wai4 wu1 jau5
examples.translation: to disintegrate

senses.definition: 辛苦做出嚟嘅嘢一瞬間全部消失；希望完全落空 (to be reduced to nothing; to disintegrate)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 佢苦心經營咗廿年嘅公司，一晚就化為烏有。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fu2 sam1 ging1 jing4 zo2 jaa6 nin4 ge3 gung1 si1, jat1 maan5 zau6 faa3 wai4 wu1 jau5
examples.translation: The company that he had worked for twenty years has disintegrated in one night.

senses.definition: 散發令人難以容忍嘅怪味 (to stink; to give out a bad smell or odour, esp. from rubbish or something rotten)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 屍體發現嘅時候已經開始發臭。
examples.translation: The corpse stank when it was discovered.

senses.definition: 形容一樣嘢差到揾唔到優點嚟讚 (there is nothing worth mentioning)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢套上緊嘅電影乏善可陳，未免過譽。
examples.jyutping: ni1 tou3 soeng5 gan2 ge3 din6 jing2 fat6 sin6 ho2 can4, mei6 min5 gwo3 jyu6.
examples.translation: The film on release has nothing worth mentioning and is probably overrated.

senses.definition: 換另一個形式，做返同一間機構，差唔多嘅職位，通常用於退休或應該離職嘅官員 (to be re-employed in the same company in a similar position; usually used to refer to retired officials or due-to retire officials)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 嗰個人明明退咗休𠺝，點解可以翻閹？
examples.jyutping: go2 go3 jan2 ming4 ming4 teoi3 zo2 jau1 gaak3, dim2 gaai2 ho2 ji5 faan1 jim1?
examples.translation: Why that person can be re-employed after retirement?

senses.definition: 施展法力，召喚風雨 (to call the wind and summon the rain (with supernatural power))
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 力量或者影響力好大，有得想做咩就做咩 (figuratively, to possess great power or influence and be able to do whatever one wants)

examples.text: 佢喺公司呼風喚雨，經理都要怕佢幾分啊。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 hai2 gung1 si1 fu1 fung1 wun6 jyu5, ging1 lei5 dou1 jiu3 paa3 keoi5 gei2 fan1 aa3.
examples.translation: He possesses great power in the company, even the manager doesn't dare to do something about it.

senses.definition: 西方人，特別係白人。呢種叫法對佢哋嚟講有貶義，但響廣東人之間用嚟形容西方事物就帶少許諧趣感。 (foreigner; especially white westerner,  Caucasian. An derogatory term toward westerners, but it can also express funny feeling amount Cantonese to describe things imported from the west. Literally: barbarian ghost man)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: 悶極
examples.translation: western mooncake - sounds like "very boring" in Cantonese

senses.definition: 做#非法 行為 (to commit a crime)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faan6 zeoi6 hok6
examples.translation: criminology

senses.definition: 見到當下情景而聯想到過去 (to associate with something in the past after seeing the current situation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢望住呢條河，撫今追昔。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 mong6 zyu6 ni1 tiu4 ho4, fu2 gam1 zeoi1 sik1
examples.translation: He looked at this river for quite a while, associating with things that happened in the past.

senses.definition: 植物因為缺少水分或營養而謝咗；乾枯、凋萎 (to wither; to wilt)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢度太耐冇落雨，啲花都枯萎晒。
examples.jyutping: nei1 dou6 taai3 noi6 mou5 lok6 jyu5, di1 faa1 dou1 fu1 wai2 saai3.
examples.translation: This place hasn't rained for a long time, the flowers are all wilted.

senses.definition: 提供#妓女 嘅營業場所（量詞：個） (brothel)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 紅色 (scarlet)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: fei1 hung4
examples.translation: scarlet

senses.definition: 原意係紅色，引伸為與愛情或性有關 (figuratively, love affair)
對男人極度渴望; 渴望得到男人嘅愛 (to crave men, to long for affection from men)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢已經單身咗十年，唔怪得佢日日都發仔狂。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ji5 ging1 daan1 san1 zo2 sap6 nin4, m4 gwaai3 dak1 keoi5 jat6 jat6 dou1 faat3 zai2 kwong4.
examples.translation: She has been a singleton for ten years, so it is no wonder that she has such a thirst for love from men.

senses.definition: 傳統用藤造嘅圓圈，玩嘅人套喺自己條腰度，用腰力令佢旋轉（量詞：個） (hula-hoop)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 從鼻或者口將空氣排出 (to breathe out)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我望住鐵灰色嘅天，呼出一口煙。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 mong6 zyu6 tit3 fui1 sik1 ge3 tin1, fu1 ceot1 jat1 hau2 jin1.
examples.translation: I stared at the iron-grey sky and made smoke come out of my mouth.

senses.definition: 虛偽、虛有其表嘅嘢 (things that are not authentic)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zyut3 mou4 faa1 gaa2
examples.translation: an assurance by sellers that the goods are of merchantable quality and not counterfeit

senses.definition: 保留及隱藏（訊息、郵件或檔案） (to archive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 公眾如果想取閲封存嘅歷史檔案，必須事先向政府檔案處處長書面申請。
examples.jyutping: gung1 zung3 jyu4 gwo2 soeng2 ceoi2 jyut6 fung1 cyun4 ge3 lik6 si2 dong2 on3, bit1 seoi1 si6 sin1 hoeng3 zing3 fu2 dong2 on3 cyu5 cyu5 zoeng2 syu1 min2 san1 cing2.
examples.translation: Access to closed records requires prior application in writing to the Government Records Service Director.

senses.definition: 舖頭度擺咗出嚟但係又唔出售嘅物品（量詞：件） (display article or gift; item that is not for sale)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 成間舖頭入面，我淨係想買件非賣品走。
examples.jyutping: sing4 gaan1 pou3 tau2 jap6 min6, ngo5 zing6 hai6 soeng2 maai5 gin6 fei1 maai6 ban2 zau2.
examples.translation: The only thing I want to buy in this shop is not for sale.

senses.definition: 分開；去唔同地方，各自行動 (to go or act separately)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: fan1 tau4 hang4 si6
examples.translation: to go separately

senses.definition: 通常喺煲底嘅一層金黃色，變脆咗嘅飯 (scorched rice; crunchy rice; the layer of browned crunchy rice usually at the bottom of a pot)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我最鐘意食煲仔飯裏面嘅飯焦。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 zeoi3 zung1 ji3 sik6 bou1 zai2 faan6 leoi5 min6 ge3 faan6 ziu1.
examples.translation: I like eating the thin crust of browned crunchy rice in clay pots.

senses.definition: 叫人停止講冇意義嘅嘢 (used to tell someone to be quiet, "cut the crap!", "shut up!")
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: jiu3 daa2 zau6 daa2, fai3 waa2 siu2 gong2!
examples.translation: If you want to fight, just fight, no more crap from your mouth!

senses.definition: 已經結婚嘅人，同伴侶以外嘅人發生嘅性關係或者情侶關係（量詞：段） (affair)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我老公晚晚都好夜返，我懷疑佢有婚外情。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 lou5 gung1 maan5 maan5 dou1 hou2 je6 faan1, ngo5 waai4 ji4 keoi5 jau5 fan1 ngoi6 cing4.
examples.translation: My husband returns home late every day. He might have an affair behind me.

senses.definition: 放置化妝用品嘅袋（量詞：個） (cosmetic bag)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: zing1 zi3 ge3 faa3 zong1 doi2
examples.translation: exquisite cosmetic bags

senses.definition: 古時作為軍事警報嘅火焰同煙霧 (smoke signal used in war)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: smoke signal

senses.definition: 即係#船 (boat)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: hoi2 sin1 fong2
examples.translation: floating seafood restaurant

senses.definition: 以某個地方為中心點，距離一定半徑內嘅範圍 (circumference)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fong1 jyun4 jat1 gung1 lei5 dou1 mou5 gung1 ci3.
examples.translation: There is no public toilet within 1 km radius.

senses.definition: 辛勞付出嘅心思同努力（量詞：片／番） (painstaking effort; trouble taking)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fu2 sam1 jin4 gau3
examples.translation: painstaking study or research

senses.definition: 重新啓動暫停咗嘅嘢 (to resume)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 活雞來港供應將會恢復正常。
examples.jyutping: wut6 gai1 loi4 gong2 gung1 jing3 zoeng1 wui6 fui1 fuk6 zing3 soeng4.
examples.translation: The supply of live chicken to HK will return to normal.

senses.definition: 身體回復正常 (to recover)

examples.text: 佢打波整親條腰，唞咗成個月先恢復。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 daa2 bo1 zing2 can1 tiu4 jiu1, tau2 zo2 sing4 go3 jyut6 sin1 fui1 fuk6.
examples.translation: He injured his waist during a ball game. It took him a whole month to recover.

senses.definition: 翻轉條領 (to upturn or pop a collar)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢著polo衫嘅時候鐘意反領，覺得咁樣比較時髦。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zoek3 pou1 lou4 saam1 ge3 si4 hau6 zung1 ji3 faan2 leng5, gok3 dak1 gam2 joeng2 bei2 gaau3 si4 mou4.
examples.translation: When wearing a polo shirt, he loves upturning the collar because he thinks this is more fashionable.

senses.definition: #手辦 模型（量詞：隻） (character figure)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 通常鍾意睇日本動漫嘅都鍾意買figure。
examples.jyutping: tung1 soeng4 zung1 ji3 tai2 jat6 bun2 dung6 maan6 ge3 dou1 zung1 ji3 maai5 fik1 gaa4.
examples.translation: People who like watching Japanese anime would usually like buying character figures.

senses.definition: 一批貨物已經賣得#七七八八 ，剩低果啲就係貨尾 (goods that are left over after a selling period)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢批貨尾嚟，平啲畀你啦。
examples.jyutping: nei1 pai1 fo3 mei5 lai4, peng4 di1 bei2 nei5 laa1.
examples.translation: These are on clearance at affordable prices.

senses.definition: 腹部或者周圍嘅部分出現痛嘅症狀 (abdominal pain, stomach pain)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 反復出現腹痛可能係癌症嘅徵兆。
examples.translation: Recurring abdominal pain can be a symptom of cancer.

senses.definition: 辨別出，區分清楚 (to be able to distinguish between)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to distinguish between right and wrong

senses.definition: 一種#蝦；體形大，蝦殼堅硬，蝦味濃郁，肉質鮮甜（量詞：隻） (tiger prawn)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 令一樣嘢重新興盛起嚟，唔再衰微 (to rejuvenate; to revive)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: man4 ngai6 fuk6 hing1
examples.translation: renaissance

senses.definition: 身體入面#橫膈膜 對落（向#盆骨 方向）嘅部份 (abdominal cavity)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 開心，舒服嘅感覺（量詞:種） (pleasant sensations, such as pleasure and excitement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 被告聲稱佢喺殺人過程中得到快感。
examples.jyutping: bei6 gou3 sing1 cing1 keoi5 hai2 saat3 jan4 gwo3 cing4 zung1 dak1 dou3 faai3 gam2
examples.translation: The defendant claimed that he had a pleasant sensation while killing.

senses.definition: 利用社會重大難關或者問題牟取暴利 (to profiteer from a nationwide disaster)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 民眾痛恨奸商無良，發國難財。
examples.jyutping: man4 zung3 tung3 han6 gaan1 soeng1 mou4 loeng4, faat3 gwok3 naan6 coi4.
examples.translation: People hate unscrupulous merchants who profiteer from the disaster bitterly.

senses.definition: 由鼻翼兩邊延伸到嘴角附近嘅皺紋（量詞：條） (smile lines; laugh lines (wrinkles that extend from the edge of the nose to the corners of the mouth))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢化咗濃妝，條法令紋都仲係好明顯。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 faa3 zo2 nung4 zong1, tiu4 faat3 ling6 man4 dou1 zung6 hai6 hou2 ming4 hin2.
examples.translation: She wears heavy make-up, but her laugh lines are still very visible.

senses.definition: 夜晚返工 (to work a night shift)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我今晚要返夜，所以晏晝要瞓下覺。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 gam1 maan5 jiu3 faan1 je2, so2 ji5 aan3 zau3 jiu3 fan3 haa5 gaau3.
examples.translation: I have a night shift today, so I need to take a nap in the afternoon.

senses.definition: 意思相反嘅詞語（量詞：個） (antonym)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: "leng3" tung4 "cau2" hai6 faan2 ji6 ci4.
examples.translation: Beautiful" and "ugly" are antonyms.

senses.definition: 身心嘅折磨 (pain; suffering)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: siu2 siu2 fu2 co2 dang2 jyu1 gik1 lai6.
examples.translation: Pain only makes you stronger.

senses.definition: 用嚟發射#火箭#武器 嘅設備（量詞：枝） (rocket launcher; bazooka)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 主要用嚟擋風嘅#褸，通常比較薄（量詞：件） (windbreaker)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 出面都幾涼。都係著返件風褸先好出街。
examples.jyutping: ceot1 min6 dou1 gei2 loeng4. dou1 hai6 zoek3 faan1 gin6 fung1 lau1 sin1 hou2 ceot1 gaai1.
examples.translation: It's somewhat cold outside. Better put on a windbreaker.

phonetic.original: fei1 soeng5 zi1 tau4 bin3 fung6 wong4
jyutping: fei1 soeng5 zi1 tau4 bin3 fung6 wong4

senses.definition: 女性喺嫁到個高貴嘅老公之後，身份亦都跟住提升；出自明末吳偉業嘅《圓圓曲》 (to be a Cinderella; literally: to fly up to the branch and become a Chinese phoenix)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: fei1 soeng5 zi1 tau4 bin3 fung6 wong4
fei soeng zi tau bin fung wong

senses.definition: #佛教 紀念佛祖#釋迦牟尼 出世嘅日子（量詞：個） (Buddha's Birthday)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 每年佛誕長洲都有太平清醮。
examples.jyutping: mui5 nin4 fat6 daan3 coeng4 zau1 dou1 jau5 taai3 ping4 cing1 ziu3.
examples.translation: Cheung Chau hosts Da Jiu Festival on Buddha's Birthday every year.

senses.definition: 水面嘅#風 同#浪；主要因為空氣流動而喺水面產生嘅起伏（量詞：陣） (stormy waves; rough seas)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今日風浪好大，唔適宜出海。
examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 fung1 long6 hou2 daai6, m4 sik1 ji4 ceot1 hoi2.
examples.translation: The sea is rough today, it's not suitable to sail.

senses.definition: 比喻為#難關、#阻礙 (difficulties; hardship; suffering)

examples.text: 佢哋經過好多風浪先可以喺埋一齊，所以好珍惜對方。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dei6 ging1 gwo3 hou2 do1 fung1 long6 sin1 ho2 ji5 hai2 maai4 jat1 cai4, so2 ji5 hou2 zan1 sik1 deoi3 fong1.
examples.translation: They have passed through a lot of hardship before getting together, that's why they treasure each other so much.

senses.definition: 角度大過一百八十度，又細過三百六十度嘅#角（量詞：個） (reflex angle)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 消失嘅速度好快 (to pass by quickly; time to fly by)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: si4 gwong1 fei1 sai6
examples.translation: time flies

senses.definition: 為咗換取物件、服務或者權利而畀一筆錢 (to pay money)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fan1 kei4 fu6 fun2
examples.translation: to pay by instalment

senses.definition: 書信用嘅客套説話，同#安慰 (pleasant, comfortable feeling; satisfaction)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 知道咗對方嘅近況之後，覺得非常欣慰
examples.translation: be extremely pleased with news about somebody's recent situation

senses.definition: #蛾 (moth, see #蛾)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 有好多人都相信飛蛾係死者靈魂嘅化身。
examples.translation: Many people believe that moths are souls of the dead given physical forms.

senses.definition: 形容資源充足 (to own more than enough resources)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 時間仲好寬裕，我哋應該做得切份 Project。
examples.jyutping: si4 gaan3 zung6 hou2 fun1 jyu6, ngo5 dei6 jing1 goi1 zou6 dak1 cit3 fan6 PROJECT.
examples.translation: We have more than enough time and are supposed to manage to complete the project in time.

senses.definition: 噴出高壓空氣嘅工具，可以用嚟洗完車噴走水珠，或者清潔電器內部等等 (handheld blower; shop blower)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 由執法、司法機關下達，有法律後果嘅命令；香港比較少噉用 (executive order; judicial order; order from an offical body with legal consequences; not a commonly used term within Hong Kong)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 地位較低嘅人照顧地位高嘅人 (to serve or to look after, esp. the rich, the sick, the aged)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢請咗個工人嚟服侍佢媽媽。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ceng2 zo2 go3 gung1 jan4 lai4 fuk6 si6 keoi5 maa4 maa1.
examples.translation: She employed a servant to take care of her mother.

senses.definition: 埋喺地下嘅遠古生物遺體經高壓高温變成嘅#燃料，包括#石油、#煤、#天然氣 (fossil fuel)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 deng3 go3 bo1 maai4 coeng4, git3 gwo2 go3 bo1 faan2 daan6 daa2 zung3 zi6 gei2.
examples.translation: He throws the ball to a wall where it rebounds and hits himself.

senses.definition: 因為環境對心理構成嘅壓力而反感、不忿 (to rebound to mental pressure)

examples.text: 公司唔合理噉加班，引起咗部分員工情緒上嘅反彈。
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 m4 hap6 lei5 gam2 gaa1 baan1, jan5 hei2 zo2 bou6 fan6 jyun4 gung1 cing4 seoi5 soeng6 ge3 faan2 daan6.
examples.translation: The unreasonable arrangement of overtime work by the company irritated a number of its staff.

senses.definition: 金融術語。喺空頭市場裏，由於股價、匯價大幅下跌已有一段時間，由低檔暫時回升 ((of financial terms) to rebound)

examples.text: 股市經過多日跌勢，今日反彈回升至日前高位。
examples.jyutping: gu2 si5 ging1 gwo3 do1 jat6 dit3 sai3, gam1 jat6 faan2 daan6 wui4 sing1 zi3 jat6 cin4 gou1 wai2.
examples.translation: The stock market saw a downward trend for the last few days, but today it rebounded to reach a previous day's high.

senses.definition: 將不滿發泄喺果個令你不滿嘅人身上 (trouble; revenge)

examples.translation: to have a bone to pick with somebody

senses.definition: 唔好運；不幸 (unluckiness; bad things)

examples.text: 帶咗呢個護身符，咩嘢晦氣病痛都唔會纏身。
examples.translation: Wearing this lucky charm, all the unluckiness and sickness will be driven away from you.

senses.definition: 形容人不滿，所以將不滿宣泄喺其他人身上 (moody; resentful)

senses.definition: 比喻反覆無常；都可以講「#覆雨翻雲」 (to be given to playing tricks; to keep shifting one's ground)

互相敵視、各不相讓嘅氣氛 (tension; powder keg; literally: the smell of gunpowder)

泳灘浮波 (beach boom)
覆返揾過你嘅人電話 (to return a call; to phone back)

senses.definition: 阿爸同仔（量詞：對） (father and son)

senses.definition: 加上#叉燒、#火腿、#蝦仁、#芽菜、#韭菜、#洋葱 等配料嘅#煎#雞蛋（量詞：隻） (egg foo yung, a Chinese style omelet with roast pork, ham, shrimp, vegetables; literally: lotus egg)

senses.definition: 君王賜封畀貴族、爵士嘅土地，通常係同受封嘅人有啲特別關係，或者有紀念價值嘅地方；喺古代通常會有相應嘅税收同其他權力，而近代行君主立憲之後，通常都係得個名嘅 (fief; fiefdom)

senses.definition: 仲未燃燒殆盡嘅#炭，或者其他燃料嘅碎片；温度仍然好高，有機會隨風飄散之後#焫 著附近嘅嘢 (ember, literally "fire shit")

senses.definition: 機構中嘅行政單位 (section; suboffice; unit)

senses.definition: 指一啲成日#放飛機 嘅人 (a person who always breaks appointments)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 wan2 keoi5 bong1 sau2 daan6 hai6 keoi5 zau6 fut3 lou2 laan5 lei5.

senses.definition: 因為未梳理好而鼓起；形容頭髮、動物嘅長毛或者其他有又長又多毛髮嘅嘢 (fluffy; dishevelled)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: tau4 faat3 fung4 sung1

examples.translation: He acts like a madman, I wonder if he's really mad or not.

senses.definition: 鋭利嘅部分 ((usu. of knives, swords, needles) sharp point or cutting edge)

examples.translation: cutting edge of a knife

senses.definition: 帶領某啲嘢嘅人 (at the front; the most advanced of something)

senses.definition: #大氣層 中兩股不同#密度 氣流嘅分界 (weather front; frontal surface)
同關節痛有關嘅病症，中醫認為大風、濕寒嘅環境會令風濕惡化 ((med.) rheumatism)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoi2 min6 ge3 fung1 lik6 hou2 maang5.

senses.definition: 錢嘅總數（量詞：筆／項） (sum of money)

examples.jyutping: min5 seoi3 ngaak2 fun2 ngaak2
examples.translation: amount of allowance

examples.jyutping: zing3 fu2 tai4 ceot1 jiu3 fun1 min5 gam1 nin2 ge3 seoi2 fai3.

examples.translation: He stepped into Africa's central region and discovered many mysteries.

senses.definition: 揈揈係風嘅擬聲詞，揈揈聲就係形容啲嘢運作緊果陣因為速度快而發出風聲 (sound produced by gusts of wind)

examples.text: 把風扇揈揈聲好似好涼噉。

senses.definition: 用高温#燒 到一樣嘢變成#灰 (to incinerate)

senses.definition: 化妝果陣，喺塊面搽一層粉作為基礎，再喺上面做其他加工；呢層基礎就係粉底 （量詞:個/隻/盒） (make-up foundation)

senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 雜亂而分散 (scattered; in disorder)

senses.definition: 意見不同而爭執 (disagreement; argument)
注意力受影響，集中唔到 (to get distracted; fail to concentrate)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 開住電視好易分神，好難認真温習。

examples.translation: You get distracted easily when the TV is on. That makes it hard for you to concentrate on doing revision.

senses.definition: 因為物主覺冇用而丟棄 (to abolish; abolished)

senses.definition: 發自內心，出於真誠而講出嚟嘅説話 (words from the bottom of one's heart)

examples.translation: These are words from the bottom of my heart. I can't believe you don't trust it.

senses.definition: 標示由邊度而嚟、邊度冒起 (to come from; to arise from)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我對你嘅愛係發自內心㗎，唔係因為你啲錢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 deoi3 nei5 ge3 oi3 hai6 faat3 zi6 noi6 sam1 gaa3, m4 hai6 jan1 wai6 nei5 di1 cin2.

senses.definition: 開心噉笑 (to smile)

examples.text: 每次我女朋友發嬲，我都會講笑話氹佢笑。
examples.translation: Every time my girlfriend is mad, I tell her jokes to make her smile again.

senses.definition: 法律凌駕於社會上所有人和物，包括政府 (rule of law)

examples.jyutping: faat3 zi6 se5 wui2

senses.definition: #法例 喺立法機關通過成為法例之前嘅形式（量詞：項／條） (proposed law; bill)

examples.text: 立法會通過一條新法案。
examples.jyutping: laap6 faat3 wui2 tung1 gwo3 jat1 tiu4 san1 faat3 on3.
examples.translation: The Legislative Council has just passed a new bill.

senses.definition: 從另一面將一道門鎖起 (to lock a door from opposite site)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 諗下自己嘅思想同行為，有咩做得好有咩做得唔好 (to reflect; to carry out introspection; to self-examine)

examples.jyutping: nei5 faan2 sing2 haa5 zi6 gei2 zou6 co3 zo2 di1 me1

senses.definition: 形容叛徒、出賣人嘅行為 (disloyal; treacherous; betraying)

examples.translation: We should treasure our lives kindly given by God.

senses.definition: 冇節制噉使錢 (to spend money lavishly; to squander)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fai1 fok3 mou4 dou6
examples.translation: to squander money

senses.definition: 解放束縛，給予自由 (to release; to let go; to set free)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢話隻雀仔俾人韞住好可憐，跟住就放走咗佢喇。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 waa6 zek3 zoek3 zai2 bei2 jan4 wan3 zyu6 hou2 ho2 lin4, gan1 zyu6 zau6 fong3 zau2 zo2 keoi5 laa3.
examples.translation: He said the bird was so pitiful of being caged, and then he set it free.

senses.definition: 建築物屋頭、中間向外凸出嘅部分，可以遮雨遮蔭 (eaves)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: jim4 pung4
examples.translation: eaves

senses.definition: 比喻事物、局勢變化不定 ((of a situation) unstable)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 固定頭髮嘅長針髮飾 (hair stick)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 zaam1 jau5 soeng6 cin1 nin4 ge3 lik6 si2
examples.translation: Hair stick has thousand years of history

senses.definition: 專為賠償火災損失嘅#保險 (fire insurance)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種好似#泥 咁嘅頭髮定型劑，通常用喺短髮，變得蓬鬆 (hair clay)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 口入面損咗嘅傷口，通常係一個白色圓形，中間因為潰瘍而微黃色，周圍呈現紅色（量詞：粒） (mouth ulcer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: to get mouth ulcer

senses.definition: #結婚 進行嘅#儀式（量詞：個／場） (wedding ceremony)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我哋嘅婚禮將會喺教堂舉行。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 ge3 fan1 lai5 zoeng1 wui5 hai2 gaau3 tong2 geoi2 hang4.
examples.translation: We will hold our wedding ceremony in a church.

senses.definition: 人煙稀少，未被開發嘅地方（量詞：個） (desolate place; wilderness)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 荒山野嶺係會多蚊啲㗎喇。
examples.jyutping: fong1 saan1 je5 leng5 hai6 wui5 do1 man1 di1 gaa3 laa3.
examples.translation: It's common to have more mosquitoes in the wilderness.

senses.definition: 以極快嘅速度移動；現今嘅用法通常都係講#車 (to zoom; to move very quickly; literally "swift as the wind and the lightning")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 架紅小喺公路上面風馳電掣，瞬間就到咗上水。
examples.translation: The red minibus zooms past the highway and arrives Sheung Shui in no time.

senses.definition: 風嘅強弱或吹嘅方向 (force of the wind; the way the wind blows)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: The fire burned more vigorously with the help of the wind.

senses.definition: 非常苦 (very bitter)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: go2 di1 caa4 fu2 diu1 diu1 ge2
examples.translation: These tea are very bitter.

senses.definition: 有禮噉招待賓客 (to treat or receive somebody cordially)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fun2 doi6 ngoi6 ban1
examples.translation: to receive foreign guests cordially

senses.definition: 1960年代常用嘅油漆嘅俗稱，成份包括有熟灰、塵灰、#英泥 等；灰水係帶有腐蝕性，加上乾後觸摸時會有好多白色粉末；而家大多畀#乳膠漆 取代 (whitewash)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 公開發售，如果「盤」係指#樓盤、物業，亦可以解作公開放租，亦可用於發售公司股份 (to sell in public for real estate; to rent to someone else; to sell company shares)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我層樓放咗盤，應該好快有人買。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 cang4 lau2 fong3 zo2 pun2, jing1 goi1 hou2 faai3 jau5 jan4 maai5.
examples.translation: I am selling my flat through property agents. I believe it will be sold very soon.

senses.definition: 將夾雜屎尿嘅污水沉澱嘅污水池，之後直接排出雨水渠（量詞：個） (septic tank)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 突然神經失常，做啲唔合常理嘅行為 (to go mad)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢隻狗尋日突然發狂，咬傷咗佢主人。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zek3 gau2 cam4 jat6 dat6 jin4 faat3 kwong4, ngaau5 soeng1 zo2 keoi5 zyu2 jan4.
examples.translation: His dog suddenly went mad yesterday and bit its master.

senses.definition: 做一啲迎合目標喜好嘅事，希望得到佢嘅喜愛。含貶義。 (to flatter; to fawn over somebody; to make up to somebody)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢讚你都係想奉承你啫。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zaan3 nei5 dou1 hai6 soeng2 fung6 sing4 nei5 ze1.
examples.translation: He praised you just because he wanted to make up to you.

senses.definition: （籃球）進攻球員射波嘅時候，防守球員將個波喺半空中打走，阻止對方得分。 (block)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢小學嘅時候就識得點去封阻。
examples.translation: He has known how to block a shot since primary school.

senses.definition: 播放影片或者拍攝影片嘅技巧：影片入面嘅時間流逝快過正常嘅時間流逝 (fast-forward motion effect; time-lapse)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 透過周邊嘅環境嚟決定吉凶禍福嘅中國傳統術數 (geomancy; commonly known as fengshui: the study of the relationship between the physical structure of a place and the fortune of the people dwelling in it, for example, the study of how the location of an ancestral tomb affects the fortune of the family)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: tai2 fung1 seoi2
examples.translation: to examine the fengshui of a place

senses.definition: 一向訓練充足，有一定水準 (to having undergone solid training for a period of time; well-trained)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢哋係一支訓練有素嘅軍隊。
examples.translation: It is a well-trained army.

senses.definition: 發展出其他支線 (to branch; to fork)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: a branching road

senses.definition: 即係#暗瘡，香港唔多講粉刺 （量詞：粒） (acne; spots)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 懲罰 (to punish)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cung4 hing1 faat3 lok6
examples.translation: to punish lightly

senses.definition: 喺水面#漂浮 嘅#死屍（量詞：條／具） (a floating corpse)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#火把 (torch)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ou3 wan6 fo2 geoi6
examples.translation: Olympic torch

senses.definition: 時間緊迫，要把握住每一分每一秒 (seizing every minute and second)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 急救係一項分秒必爭嘅任務。
examples.jyutping: gap1 gau3 hai6 jat1 hong6 fan1 miu5 bit1 zang1 ge3 jam6 mou6.
examples.translation: Performing first-aid is a mission that every second matters.

senses.definition: 唔單止 (not only)
senses.label: 連詞

examples.text: 佢非但唔幫受害者，仲要踩多腳。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fei1 daan6 m4 bong1 sau6 hoi6 ze2, zung6 jiu3 caai2 do1 goek3.
examples.translation: Not only did he not help the victim, but he also kick the victim when he is down.

senses.definition: 件衫闊闊哋，肥肥大大 (oversized clothes)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢件衫佢著起嚟闊咧啡噉，好肉酸。
examples.translation: This oversized shirt makes him look so fatty and ugly!

senses.definition: 收納信紙、錢嘅紙製信封 (envelope)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: pocket money

senses.definition: 物質嘅#分子 結構產生變化嘅過程（量詞：個） (chemical reaction)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比喻兩個人撻着火頭嗰時所生嘅情愫 (a metaphor for the spark of love between individuals; "chemistry")

examples.text: 你哋噚晚兩個人去咗飲嘢，有冇啲咩化學作用？
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 cam4 maan5 loeng5 go3 jan4 heoi3 zo2 jam2 je5, jau5 mou5 di1 me1 faa3 hok6 zok3 jung6?
examples.translation: You two went for a drink last night; was there any chemistry?

senses.definition: 個#颱風 啱啱走嘅時段 (the period when the tropical cyclone is leaving)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 風尾有時仲大風大雨過個風最近嗰陣。
examples.jyutping: fung1 mei5 jau5 si4 zung6 daai6 fung1 daai6 jyu5 gwo3 go3 fung1 zeoi3 kan5 go2 zan6.
examples.translation: The storm is sometimes stronger when the typhoon is leaving than when it is the closest.

senses.definition: 以#科學 為基礎，對未來作出推測或幻想嘅故事；有別於包含超自然元素嘅#奇幻 (science fiction (sci-fi))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fo1 waan6 pin2
examples.translation: sci-fi movie

senses.definition: #忽然；#突然 (suddenly)
senses.label: 副詞

senses.definition: 古時對老師或者學者嘅敬稱 (a respectful form of address for teachers or scholars)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 喺香港以前中學#會考 嘅其中一科#進階#數學 課程，其中包括數學#歸納法、#向量、#微積分 等課題。隨住2010年香港中學#文憑試 取代會考同#高考，附加數學內容已經整合咗喺數學科（延伸部份）入面 (Additional Mathematics, one of the subjects in the former Hong Kong Certificate of Education Examination)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 用嚟做「上偏旁」嘅部首「虍」（量詞：個） (Kangxi radical "虍", which is used on the top of a character)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 無論風勢、雨勢有幾大，某件事、某個動作嘅安排都唔會因為落雨同打風而改變 (to remain the arrangements of an event or action unchanged despite (strong) wind and (heavy) rain)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 緊急服務團隊風雨不改，守護市民嘅性命同財產安全。
examples.jyutping: gan2 gap1 fuk6 mou6 tyun4 deoi2 fung1 jyu5 bat1 goi2, sau2 wu6 si5 man4 ge3 sing3 ming6 tung4 coi4 caan2 on1 cyun4.
examples.translation: Emergency service teams safeguard lives and properties of citizens despite extreme weather.

senses.definition: 亦都引申指身處逆境都唔會改變自己嘅品行或者態度 (figuratively, to remain one's conduct or attitude unchanged despite hardship)

examples.text: 佢一直以嚟風雨不改、盡心盡力噉服務街坊。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 jat1 zik6 ji5 lai4 fung1 jyu5 bat1 goi2, zeon6 sam1 zeon6 lik6 gam2 fuk6 mou6 gaai1 fong1.
examples.translation: He has kept his devotion to serving the neighbourhood.

senses.definition: 速度高；運作時間短 (at high speed)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.jyutping: faai3 cuk1 syun4 zyun2
examples.translation: to revolve at high speed

senses.definition: 範圍好廣嘅火災，成個海噉 (sea of flames)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 金正恩話要將南韓變成火海。
examples.jyutping: gam1 zing3 jan1 waa6 jiu3 zoeng1 naam4 hon4 bin3 sing4 fo2 hoi2.
examples.translation: Kim Jong-un claimed that he will turn South Korea into a sea of flame.

senses.definition: 隱藏位置，等敵人路過嗰陣先出現攻擊嘅戰略部署 (ambush)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 形容人神色憂傷、眉頭深鎖，好唔開心、好多煩惱噉 (to look miserable, depressed or gloomy; literally, bitter mouth bitter face)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 自從佢畀人炒咗之後，佢日日都苦口苦面噉。
examples.jyutping: zi6 cung4 keoi5 bei2 jan4 caau2 zo2 zi1 hau6, keoi5 jat6 jat6 dou1 fu2 hau2 fu2 min6 gam2.
examples.translation: Since he got fired, he has worn a gloomy face every day.

senses.definition: 即係#園丁，係一種職業，專門打理花草樹木（量詞：個） (gardener)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 花中之王，係#牡丹 嘅別名 (peony)
為咗一樣嘢付出全副心機，全部投入 (to exhaust all mental efforts)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢費盡心思，幾經辛苦終於寫完本書。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 fai3 zeon6 sam1 si1, gei2 ging1 san1 fu2 zung1 jyu1 se2 jyun4 bun2 syu1.
examples.translation: He spent all his efforts and finally finished this book.

senses.definition: 細小而且接近圓形物體嘅量詞；粵語通常講#粒 (a small and round piece of)
senses.label: 量詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 nap1 sing1
examples.translation: a star

senses.definition: 用盡全力、全部資源 (to spare no effort; to go all in)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 project keoi5 fan3 san1 gam2 zou6 gaa3.
examples.translation: He spares no effort in working for this project.

senses.definition: 以#腐皮 為主要材料嘅中式小食；根據個人喜好將食材放喺腐皮上面，捲成一小卷，然後攞去煎就得（量詞：嚿） (bean curd roll)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 民眾一齊行動 ((go with) the crowd)
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 冷氣機出風個位（量詞：個） (air vent; gusty area)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你坐喺個冷氣風口位，梗係凍啦！
examples.jyutping: nei5 co5 hai2 go3 laang5 hei3 fung1 hau2 wai2, gang2 hai6 dung3 laa1!
examples.translation: You're sitting at the vent of the air-conditioner, of course you would feel cold!

senses.definition: 不停噉#轆 (to roll)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: go3 bo1 hai2 dou6 faan1 gwan2.
examples.translation: The ball is rolling.

senses.definition: 喺比賽、頒獎典禮入面頒發好多獎項，大部分參賽者都有獎，令獎項變得冇代表性 (to award all participants in a competition, ceremony, to make everyone happy but devalue; literally: to share pork)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個頒獎典禮分豬肉嘅，唔睇都罷啦。
examples.translation: This ceremony simply gives every participated artist awards. Why do I have to watch it?

senses.definition: 做某件時果陣保持心情愉快 (joyful; happy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 成班男人飲酒傾計真係開心。
examples.translation: It's joyful to drink and chat with my male friends.

senses.definition: 一種淡綠色藥油，用嚟舒緩痛楚痕癢、頭暈，亦有清涼作用 (a kind of medicated oil)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 民間信仰中，土地神嘅一種男性長者人格，即係#土地公，係地方保護神，全稱福德正神或者福德老爺 (Fuk Tak; Earth God; To Ti; To Tei)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: fuk1 dak1 gung1
examples.translation: temple or shrine dedicated to Fuk Tak

senses.definition: 所佔嘅份量 (share; portion)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 今季服務業佔GDP份額下跌。
examples.jyutping: gam1 gwai3 fuk6 mou6 jip6 zim3 GDP fan6 ngaak2 haa6 dit3.
examples.translation: The portion of the service industry in GDP this quarter drops.

senses.definition: 唔容許人越過嘅一種區域限制（量詞：條） (cordon)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 各種花卉被賦予嘅象徵意義 (language of flowers; floriography)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baak6 baak3 hap6 ge3 faa1 jyu5 hai6 seon4 git3.
examples.translation: White lily represents purity in the language of flowers.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
亂搞性關係，冇自制能力 (dissolute; licentious indulging in sexual or indulgent pleasure)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 秦二世係出晒名荒淫無道嘅皇帝。
examples.jyutping: ceon4 ji6 sai3 hai6 ceot1 saai3 meng2 fong1 jam4 mou4 dou6 ge3 wong4 dai3.
examples.translation: The 2nd Emperor of Qing Dynasty is famous for his licentious indulging in sexual pleasure.

senses.definition: #聯針 (to stitch wounds)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 手術完個醫生幫我縫針縫得好仔細，個傷口冇𤶸咁滯。
examples.jyutping: sau2 seot6 jyun4 go3 ji1 sang1 bong1 ngo5 fung4 zam1 fung4 dak1 hou2 zi2 sai3, go3 soeng1 hau2 mou5 laa1 gam3 zai6.
examples.translation: After the surgery, the doctor stitched my wounds very neatly, I couldn't see my scars at all.

senses.definition: 為重要官員、軍隊將領擔任私人助理嘅軍警人員 (Aide-de-camp; adjutant)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 同所養嘅狗去散步 (to walk the dog)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jat1 jat6 fong3 saam1 ci3 gau2 gaa3.
examples.translation: I walk my dog three times a day.

senses.definition: 古代中國選拔官員嘅考試 (imperial examination, a civil service examination system in Imperial China)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 冇親屬關係 (not having a close family relationship with)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 你同佢非親非故，做咩要咁幫佢唧？
examples.jyutping: nei5 tung4 keoi5 fei1 can1 fei1 gu3, zou6 me1 jiu3 gam3 bong1 keoi5 zek1?
examples.translation: You don't have a family relationship, why are you helping him so much?

senses.definition: 會計界術語：指有人偽造工作紀錄，實際並未作相關測試或查核 (slang in accounting firm; to fake a test or working record)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #退出 一段時間又#重操故業 (to be back on stage or into the public arena, esp. for those who have retired from the performing careers for a period of time)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢個歌手之前話退休，而家又復出。
examples.jyutping: ni1 go3 go1 sau2 zi1 cin4 waa6 teoi3 jau1, ji4 gaa1 jau6 fuk6 ceot1.
examples.translation: This singer announced his retirement before, and now he is back on stage again.

senses.definition: 一個#分數 入面，將#分子 同#分母 上下分開嘅線 (fraction bar)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #南瓜 (pumpkin)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 利用疑問句嘅形式去表達肯定嘅意思 (to ask a rhetorical question)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 問返向你提問嗰個人問題；回覆人嗰陣問返佢嘢 (to ask someone who has asked you a question; to ask in reply)
細過0嘅#數字 (negative number)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #疣 嘅俗稱 (warts)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 建築材料；有紋嘅鐵支，通常用嚟做#鋼筋 (deformed bar)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 花舖；賣花嘅舖頭（量詞：間） (florist's; flower shop)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 製作及售賣慶祝用#花牌 嘅店舖 (shop which produces and sells traditional plaques used for celebrations)
好嚴峻、危急嘅形勢 (critical situation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 家下風頭火勢，都係唔好去嗰度旅行住喇。
examples.jyutping: gaa1 haa5 fung1 tau4 fo2 sai3, dou1 hai6 m4 hou2 heoi3 go2 dou6 leoi5 hang4 zyu6 laa3.
examples.translation: The situation is critical right now. We'd better not travel there.

senses.definition: 唔方便表達嘅為難之處（量詞：個） (pain or difficulty that is hard to mention to others; kind intention that is not expressed)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢講大話其實係有苦衷嘅。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 gong2 daai6 waa6 kei4 sat6 hai6 jau5 fu2 cung1 ge2.
examples.translation: He has his own reason for telling this lie.

senses.definition: 出盡全力 (to rouse oneself; to make a determined effort)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 fan5 gung1 zok3
examples.translation: to put all one's energy into one's job

senses.definition: 患#麻風 病 (having leprosy)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 形容好投入一件事，可以連食飯同瞓覺都唔理 (to forget to eat and sleep since one is completely absorbed in working)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 為咗入大學，佢呢半年都廢寢忘餐噉讀書。
examples.jyutping: wai6 zo2 jap6 daai6 hok6, keoi5 ni1 bun3 nin4 dou1 fai3 cam2 mong4 caan1 gam2 duk6 syu1.
examples.translation: For the sake of entering university, he was totally absorbed with his studying in the last six months, neglecting meals and rest.

senses.definition: 以往廣州人對西洋人嘅#蔑稱，番即係#鬼佬，啄係指西洋人鼻高而尖如鷹咀 (An offensive calling of the westerners in previous Canton. Faan means "Faan gweilo", Doeng is the beak of the bird, to describe westerner's nose are often pointed as bird.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 加熱至蒸發緊嘅水 (boiling water)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好畀啲細路掂到滾水。
examples.jyutping: m4 hou2 bei2 di1 sai3 lou6 dim3 dou2 gwan2 seoi2.
examples.translation: Don't let your children touch boiling water.

senses.definition: 形容食物含有好多脂肪 ((usu. of food) fatty, greasy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 食埋咁多肥膩嘢，小心心臟病啊。
examples.jyutping: sik6 maai4 gam3 do1 fei4 nei6 je5, siu2 sam1 sam1 zong6 beng6 aa3.
examples.translation: You risk getting heart disease if you keep consuming so much fatty food.

senses.definition: 參加考試 (to join an examination)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 中國以前啲人都要上京考試。
examples.translation: In ancient Chinese, scholars joined the examination held in the capital.

senses.definition: 見 #逢親 (whenever)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 佢凡親出街都帶埋隻狗。
examples.translation: He brings along with his dog whenever he goes out.

senses.definition: 同普通嘅唔同，比起普通嘅更加優秀、傑出 (outstanding; not of the common sort)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 今年嘅紀念活動有煙花匯演，真係非同凡響。
examples.translation: There is fireworks show in this year's anniversary, that is really extraordinary.

senses.definition: 淨係掛住玩，不務正業，對感情唔認真嘅男士（量詞：個） (playboy; corinthian; man about town)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 你唔係覺得個花花公子會同你結婚下話？
examples.jyutping: nei5 m4 hai6 gok3 dak1 go3 faa1 faa1 gung1 zi2 wui5 tung4 nei5 git3 fan1 haa6 waa5?
examples.translation: Do you really think that playboy will marry you?

senses.definition: 做嘢唔認真，只係表面應付一下 (to perform one's duty in a perfunctory manner)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 利用對方間諜放假料畀敵人，擾亂敵方部署 (to sow discord among the enemy)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 附屬於大國嘅小國 (Vassal state)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 人類頭頂上面嘅#毛；#頭髮 (hair)
senses.label: 語素

examples.jyutping: faat3 sin3
examples.translation: hairline

senses.definition: 動植物繁殖並擴展自己嘅血脈 (to breed; to procreate)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 出外升學 (to go abroad for further studies)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fu6 kap1 jing1 leon4
examples.translation: to go to Britain for further studies

senses.definition: 令自己失去尊嚴 (to demean oneself; literally: to offend cheap)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: #食飯 嗰時用到嘅#枱（量詞：張） (dining table)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 過份理想、樂觀，不切實際，太大諗頭 (to be impractically too idealistic or optimistic; literally "too early to dream")
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: 同以前#一齊 嘅#伴侶 一齊返 (to start over with one's ex; to "re-start")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 go3 iks6 soeng2 faan1 taat1 ngo5 aa3.
examples.translation: My ex wants to start over with me.

senses.definition: 被己方活捉而剝奪自由嘅敵人（量詞：名／個） (captive; prisoner of war)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 ning4 jyun2 sei2 dou1 m4 zou6 fu1 lou5.
examples.translation: I would rather be killed than captured.

senses.definition: 唔再#停職，恢復職位，行使返職責 (to resume one's post and duties)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢經過內部調查之後已經復職。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 ging1 gwo3 noi6 bou6 diu6 caa4 zi1 hau6 ji5 ging1 fuk6 zik1.
examples.translation: After the internal inspection, he resumed his post.

senses.definition: 用過或者冇用嘅紙（通常指印刷或者書寫用嘅紙，好少講包裝紙）（量詞：張/疊/堆） (used paper or useless paper (usually writing or printing paper or printed materials, seldom packing or wrapping paper))
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ling1 di1 fai3 zi2 heoi3 wui4 sau1 laa1.
examples.translation: Send used paper to be recycled.

senses.definition: 同預料或者直覺相反；有出乎意料嘅意味 (on the contrary; instead)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 你噉做唔單止幫唔到佢，反而會阻住佢𠻹！
examples.jyutping: nei5 gam2 zou6 m4 daan1 zi2 bong1 m4 dou2 keoi5, faan2 ji4 wui5 zo2 zyu6 keoi5 tim1!
examples.translation: If you work like that not only will you not help him, on the contrary you will be a hindrance.

senses.definition: 乾枯無肉嘅死人嘅全副骨骼或頭骨 (skeleton; skull)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 響外國讀書嘅男仔，尤其係喺歐美；女仔叫#番書妹 (male student who studies overseas, specifically in the west (#番書妹 for females))
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 就所提供嘅#服務 所收取嘅#費用，一般係指商品以外嘅額外收費 (service charge)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 香港大部分餐廳食肆都設有加一服務費。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 daai6 bou6 fan6 caan1 teng1 sik6 si3 dou1 cit3 jau5 gaa1 jat1 fuk6 mou6 fai3.
examples.translation: Restaurants in Hong Kong often add a 10% service charge to the bill.

senses.definition: #廚師 嘅俗稱，通常用嚟稱呼#大廚 或者廚房入邊嘅話事人 (nickname for chef; literally: Kitchen General)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 期限到之前嘅限期 (grace period)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jat1 nin4 fun1 haan6
examples.translation: a year's grace period

senses.definition: 速度高；動作使用嘅時間短 (quick; fast)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢做嘢好快手，唔使人催。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zou6 je5 hou2 faai3 sau2, m4 sai2 jan4 ceoi1.
examples.translation: He works very fast and we don't need to push him.

senses.definition: 食用；多指藥物 (to take, esp. pills, drugs, etc.)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 一定要依醫生指示服食抗生素。
examples.jyutping: jat1 ding6 jiu3 ji1 ji1 sang1 zi2 si6 fuk6 sik6 kong3 sang1 sou3
examples.translation: We must follow the doctor's instructions to take antibiotics.

senses.definition: 指一份工壓力少、工作輕鬆、可有可無；睇返#風流 (a job position that is low in pressure, easy to handle, not important. Literally: leisure job)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: daa2 fung1 lau4 gung1
examples.translation: to do the job purely for leisure

senses.definition: 按照之前嘅約定，同某人見面 (to keep or attend an appointment)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: cing2 zeon2 si4 fu6 joek3.
examples.translation: Please be punctual for the appointment.

senses.definition: 從事設計髮型同剪髮工作嘅人（量詞：個） (hairstylist)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢做咗十年，終於成為香港有名嘅髮型師。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zou6 zo2 sap6 nin4, zung1 jyu1 sing4 wai4 hoeng1 gong2 jau5 meng2 ge3 faat3 jing4 si1.
examples.translation: Working for ten years, he has become a famous hairstylist in Hong Kong.

senses.definition: 有錢嘅生意人 （量詞：個） (rich merchant)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個富商又買多咗三棟樓。
examples.jyutping: go3 fu3 soeng1 jau6 maai5 do1 zo2 saam1 dung6 lau2.
examples.translation: The rich merchant just purchased 3 more buildings.

senses.definition: 用火燻過嘅#蒜頭（量詞：粒） (roasted garlic)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種工具；有兩部分，下半部係畀手揸住嘅長棒，而上半部喺沉重而鋒利嘅刀刃，運用重量同#槓桿 原理嚟#劈 或者#砍 開物件 （量詞：把） (hatchet; axe)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 後綴，表示未完成就預售嘅商品 (suffix to mean any product to be completed for advance sale)
senses.label: 詞綴

examples.jyutping: lau4 faa1
examples.translation: pre-sale uncompleted flat

senses.definition: 比喻女性嘅後綴 (suffix related to a female)

examples.jyutping: haau6 faa1
examples.translation: belle of a school; literally 'school flower'

senses.definition: 拒絕受控制 (to revolt; to resist)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 你哋已經被包圍，唔好再反抗，出嚟投降啦。
examples.jyutping: nei5 dei6 ji5 ging1 bei6 baau1 wai4, m4 hou2 zoi3 faan2 kong3, ceot1 lai4 tau4 hong4 laa1.
examples.translation: You are all besieged. Don't try to revolt and come out to surrender.

senses.definition: 將一件工作分畀唔同嘅人去做，期間保持溝通合作，希望可以以多人之力，有效率噉完成一件事 (to divide up and share the work in a cooperative manner, referring to division of labour)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 大家分工合作，事情好快就會辦妥。
examples.jyutping: daai6 gaa1 fan1 gung1 hap6 zok3, si6 cing4 hou2 faai3 zau6 wui5 baan6 to5.
examples.translation: If we cooperate with each other and share the workload, we can finish the job in a short time.

senses.definition: 狐狸毛；會用嚟整衫 (fox's hair)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 化學元素，原子序係9，符號係F (fluorine)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 化學元素，原子序係23，符號係V，係過渡金屬 (vanadium)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 利用科學技術，協助法庭處理、解決案件嘅方法，又叫法庭科學或鑑識科學，包括#鑑證、#法醫學 等等嘅分支 (forensics, forensics science)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 zing3 si6 mou6 bou6
examples.translation: forensic science division

senses.definition: 舊時細路玩嘅嘢，將條繩套落兩隻手嘅手指頭，然後翹出各種花樣 (string figure; string trick)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: x(量詞:隻/艘) (windsurfing; sailboard)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 利用#凸透鏡 將物體嘅映像放大，以便觀察嘅工具（量詞：個） (magnifying glass)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 關係密切，並且可以深信嘅人 (a deeply trusted person)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢點都估唔到佢嘅腹心會出賣佢。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 dim2 dou1 gu2 m4 dou3 keoi5 ge3 fuk1 sam1 wui5 ceot1 maai6 keoi5.
examples.translation: He could not have ever expected that his deeply trusted friend would betray him.

senses.definition: 將冷飯殘菜翻煮 (to recook leftover dishes)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 重提舊事，引起注意 (to rehash or repeat old information as new or original)

examples.text: 陳小明當紅，十年前嘅緋聞又俾人翻炒。
examples.jyutping: can4 siu2 ming4 dong1 hung4, sap6 nin4 cin4 ge3 fei2 man4 jau6 bei2 jan4 faan1 caau2
examples.translation: Ming is now the talk of the town, and old gossips about him have been rehashed in the media.

senses.definition: 甘願承受苦厄 (to be willing to undergo any hardship; to be willing to go through fire and water)
senses.label: 語句

examples.jyutping: fu6 tong1 dou6 fo2, zoi6 so2 bat1 ci4
examples.translation: one will not decline despite hardship

senses.definition: #性病 嘅別稱，又叫做#花柳病；源於「#尋花問柳」 (venereal disease)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: to be infected by a venereal disease

senses.definition: #妓院 嘅別稱 (brothel)

examples.jyutping: faa1 lau5 zi1 dei6
examples.translation: redlight district

senses.definition: 電器嘅功率，計算單位係#watt ／#火 (power rating)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 嗰部吸塵機火數都幾大，成千五火。
examples.jyutping: go2 bou6 kap1 can4 gei1 fo2 sou3 dou1 gei2 daai6, seng4 cin1 ng5 fo2.
examples.translation: That vacuum cleaner has quite the power rating at 1500W.

senses.definition: 眼前出現細黑點或者浮遊物嘅症狀 (floater)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 空間多 ((of rooms) broad; spacious; roomy)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 呢間房咁闊落，不如做會議室啦。
examples.jyutping: ni1 gaan1 fong2 gam3 fut3 lok6, bat1 jyu4 zou6 wui6 ji5 sat1 laa1.
examples.translation: This room is so spacious, let's make it the conference room.

senses.definition: 人嘅際遇會不斷轉變，可能呢刻成功，轉頭就失敗，亦都可能呢一刻好黑，下一秒就行運，冇辦法預計 (fortunes change, "the boot will be on the other foot"; literally "the wheel of fortune turns")
senses.label: 語句

senses.definition: #法律 以及#紀律 嘅合稱 (law and discipline)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: muk6 mou4 faat3 gei2
examples.translation: to disregard law and discipline

senses.definition: 休息嘅一種，期間會暫時失去知覺，身體會放鬆並減低對身邊四周嘅刺激反應 (to sleep)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: je6 laa3, hou2 heoi3 fan3 gaau3 laa3.
examples.translation: It's late. You should go to sleep.

senses.definition: 數量不足 (to lack)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: not to lack in

senses.definition: 為咗表揚功績同貢獻而頒發嘅獎牌，可以扣喺衫上面或者戴喺頸上（量詞：個） (medal for commendable achievement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baan1 sau6 jing1 jung5 fan1 zoeng1
examples.translation: to award the medal for bravery

senses.definition: 同時關注多過一樣嘢，唔可以專心其中一樣 ((of one's attention) to distract; to be distracted)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢做起嘢上嚟絕對唔會分心。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 zou6 hei2 je5 soeng5 lai4 zyut6 deoi3 m4 wui5 fan1 sam1.
examples.translation: He will never be distracted when he is working.

senses.definition: 人同人之間失去團結，互相指責 (to split; to divide; to polarise)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: se5 wui2 fan1 faa3
examples.translation: the society is divided

senses.definition: 取火嘅工具，同火石撞擊生火。 (fire striker; firesteel)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指家禽或豬肉表皮經燒、焗或炸等高温烹調法後，變得金黃酥脆；響燒豬上尤指一種特殊技巧，響燒嘅時候搽上白酒，令豬皮出現酥化形成麻狀，可以保持酥脆更長時間 (the skin of pork, poultry becomes crispy after barbecue, roast or deep fried; especially means the special technique to apply spirits on the skin during roasting, the skin become puffy thus letting the crispness last longer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: crispy barbecue BB pork

senses.definition: 燒豬嘅肋骨 (ribs of BBQ pork)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: dau6 fu6 fo2 naam5 faan6
examples.translation: braised tofu and roast pork with rice

senses.definition: 恢復衰亡嘅#國家 (to re-establish a country)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 有肥效嘅水，包括糞尿、溝渠坑池內嘅水 (nutrient-rich water for fertilisation)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 將#飯 由飯煲#潷 出嚟嘅#殼（量詞：個） (rice scoop)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 揭曉#公開試 嘅成績 (to publish exam results or a list of successful candidates)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: wui6 haau2 fong3 bong2
examples.translation: to publish the results of the Hong Kong Certificate of Education Examination

senses.definition: 啱啱孵出嘅青蛙，喺佢未生出腳，剩係識游水之前都係蝌蚪 (tadpole)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 放啲被人養、捉嘅動物返去郊區、大海，唔再由人照顧 (to free an animal from captivity)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 尋晚我放生咗屋企養嗰隻龜去郊外。
examples.jyutping: cam4 maan5 ngo5 fong3 saang1 zo2 uk1 kei2 joeng5 go2 zek3 gwai1 heoi3 gaau1 ngoi6?
examples.translation: Last night I freed our pet turtle in the countryside.

senses.definition: 唔追究責任 (not to blame; to insist on accountability)

examples.text: 佢累公司冇咗幾百萬生意，你竟然放生佢？
examples.jyutping: keoi5 leoi6 gung1 si1 mou5 zo2 gei2 baak3 maan6 saang1 ji3, nei5 ging2 jin4 fong3 saang1 keoi5?
examples.translation: It's him who made the company suffered millions of loss. How come you don't get him held responsible?

senses.definition: 起源於法國嘅極限運動，牽涉跑步、跳躍、攀爬、翻滾等動作，克服日常生活嘅障礙物去迅速移動；喺香港，多數稱為#Parkour (parkour)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 fei1 joek3 dou6 hip3 wui2
examples.translation: Hong Kong Parkour Association

senses.definition: 髮根嘅界線 (hairline)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: faat3 sin3 hau6 teoi3
examples.translation: receding hairline

senses.definition: 四圍都出現戰役 (to have battles everywhere)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 二次大戰期間，烽煙四起。
examples.jyutping: ji6 ci3 daai6 zin3 kei4 gaan1, fung1 jin1 sei3 hei2.
examples.translation: During the WWII, battles were everywhere.

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
肥得嚟好健康、好得意，通常愛嚟形容小朋友 (plump; chubby (in a positive, healthy sense, especially for babies and young children))
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 睇下佢，塊面肥嘟嘟幾得意！我好想錫佢一啖呀！
examples.jyutping: tai2 haa5 keoi5, faai3 min6 fei4 dyut1 dyut1 gei2 dak1 ji3! ngo5 hou2 soeng2 sek3 keoi5 jat1 daam6 aa3!
examples.translation: Look at his chubby, lovely face. I really want to kiss him on the cheek!

senses.definition: 學校嘅食物供應商，負責營運飯堂或者提供午餐盒畀學生（量詞：間） (school lunch supplier)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 間間飯商嘅飯盒都咁難食㗎喇，唔駛再重新招標啦。
examples.jyutping: gaan1 gaan1 faan6 soeng1 ge3 faan6 hap2 dou1 gam3 naan4 sik6 gaa3 laa3, m4 sai2 zoi3 cung4 san1 ziu1 biu1 laa1.
examples.translation: The lunch suppliers are all crappy and the lunchboxes taste the same. There is no point in tendering again.

senses.definition: #結婚 嘅事（量詞：場） (marriage; wedding)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我父母反對我哋嘅婚事。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 fu6 mou5 faan2 deoi3 ngo5 dei6 ge3 fan1 si6.
examples.translation: My parents disagree with our marriage.

senses.definition: 職位名，處於部長之下，系長同班長之上，屬中層管理人員 (a position of section manager, lower rank then department manager, higher then group leader and supervisor, a mid-level management staff)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 諷刺響遊戲中畀好多錢#課金 升級嘅玩家 (the master of 'pay to win'; an irony term)

examples.text: 睇佢升裝備升到咁高級但玩得咁渣，就知佢係課長啦。
examples.translation: From his high grade equipment but low grade skills, you should know he is just a 'pay to win' player.

senses.definition: 言行舉止有度量而且美好 (demeanour; manners; charm or style of personality)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: san1 si2 fung1 dou6
examples.translation: gentlemanly demeanour

senses.definition: 一種輕身嘅平面材料，由上下兩塊薄嘅木質纖維板，黐喺一層#蜂巢 狀嘅空心厚芯板而成（量詞：塊） (board-on-frame)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 蜂巢板嘅優點係輕得嚟唔會唔硬淨。
examples.jyutping: fung1 caau4 baan2 ge3 jau1 dim2 hai6 heng1 dak1 lai4 m4 wui5 m4 ngaang6 zeng6.
examples.translation: The strengths of boards-on-frame are that they are light while also tough enough.

senses.definition: 即係#好似；形容兩件事嘅性質相近 (seemingly; as if)
senses.label: 副詞

examples.text: 飲咗啲酒，我好似喺洗衣機入面噉天旋地轉。
examples.translation: I feel dizzy as if I was in a washing machine after I drink some wine.

senses.definition: 即係#好似；形容一件事可能有發生 (seemingly)

examples.jyutping: hou2 ci5 jau5 ni1 gin6 si6
examples.translation: to have a vague idea that it did happen

senses.definition: #法律 嘅具體條文 （量詞：條／項） (legal statue; ordinance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 香港法例規定嘅最低工資，最初只係每小時廿八蚊。
examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 faat3 lai6 kwai1 ding6 ge3 zeoi3 dai1 gung1 zi1, zeoi3 co1 zi2 hai6 mui5 siu2 si4 jaa6 baat3 man1.
examples.translation: The prescribed minimum hourly wage was just $28 per hour at first.

senses.definition: 比喻艱難困苦嘅經歷 (hardship of one's journey or life; literally: wind and frost)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: baau2 ging1 fung1 soeng1
examples.translation: to endure loads of hardship

senses.definition: 一齊做 (to do something together)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: fung6 pui4 dou3 dai2

senses.definition: #喬裝（扮成另一個身份）去搜集證據，通常用於警察或者記者 (to conduct a sting operation; to conduct an undercover investigation; literally "to release snake")
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 警察放蛇冚咗呢個賣淫集團。
examples.jyutping: ging2 caat3 fong3 se4 kam2 zo2 ni1 go3 maai6 jam4 zaap6 tyun4.
examples.translation: The police cracked down this prostitution ring with help from undercover officers.

senses.definition: 外形；外表（量詞：個／隻） (style; pattern; design; appearance)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ni1 zek3 fun2 gei2 leng3 wo3.
examples.translation: This design looks good.

senses.definition: 唔想浪費時間傾談，#話不投機半句多 咁嘅意思 (A fucking waste of time to discuss)
senses.label: 語句

examples.text: 同呢啲衰人真係法蘭西皇帝啦，費撚事傾呀！
examples.translation: We should play "France King" to those scums, that means it is a fucking waste of time to discuss with them !

senses.definition: 為咗獲得其他人嘅援助，而大聲#呼叫，引起佢哋嘅注意 (to call for help)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 遇到色狼應該大聲呼救。
examples.jyutping: jyu6 dou3 sik1 long4 jing1 goi1 daai6 sing1 fu1 gau3.
examples.translation: You should call for help if you ever encounter a pervert.

senses.definition: 頹、失落、灰心 (feeling down, depressed, disappointed, discouraged)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 唉，好灰機呀，我又收咗張好人卡喇……
examples.jyutping: aai1, hou2 fui1 gei1 aa3, ngo5 jau6 sau1 zo2 zoeng1 hou2 jan4 kaat1 laa3
examples.translation: Sigh, I'm so upset. I've been friend-zoned again after I confessed my feelings.

senses.definition: 任天堂1983年推出嘅家用遊戲機，由於機身以紅同白為主色，喺華人圈被俗稱為#紅白機。佢嘅歐美版機身主色以灰為主，因而被俗稱為灰機。 (Nintendo Company released a home game console in 1983 called Family Computer(Famicom), it's main color is red and white, so it is called the "Red White Console" in ethnic Chinese society. The Euro and US version of it called "Nintendo Entertainment System(NES)", the main color of the console is grey, so it is called "Grey Console")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 好有效率 (quick; efficient)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 faai3 sau2 faai3 goek3 zap1 maai4 di1 je5.
examples.translation: She packed all the things efficiently.

senses.definition: 收咗錢但係唔入賬 (to receive payment without booking)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 個收銀飛單被經理做到。
examples.translation: The cashier stole and was caught by the manager.

senses.definition: 安排用嚟食飯嘅錢 (money for meals)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 mui5 jat6 jau5 jat1 baak3 man1 faan6 cin2.
examples.translation: I have $100 for meals every day.

senses.definition: 本來形容花木嘅枝葉隨風搖擺；比喻女子打扮得靚，婀娜多姿 (to dress beautifully and bright-coloured)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: 好攰好想訓覺，意識開始模糊 (drowsy)

examples.translation: If you feel drowsy while driving, you should stop and take a break for a while.

senses.definition: 無人島嶼（量詞：個） (deserted island)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢喺荒島生存咗 10 年先至獲救。

senses.definition: #封閉#道路 (road closure)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 高速公路發生交通意外，警察到場封路，附近一帶交通嚴重擠塞。
examples.jyutping: gou1 cuk1 gung1 lou6 faat3 sang1 gaau1 tung1 ji3 ngoi6, ging2 caat3 dou3 coeng4 fung1 lou6, fu6 gan6 jat1 daai3 gaau1 tung1 jim4 zung6 zai1 sak1.
examples.translation: There was an accident on the highway, leading to police closing roads, causing serious traffic jams nearby.

senses.definition: 將#棺材 封實 (to seal the coffin)

examples.jyutping: cyun4 tung2 fung1 gun1 hai6 lok6 tit3 deng1 ge3.
examples.translation: In tradition coffins are sealed with nails.

senses.definition: 液體受到壓力而彈起 (to splash)

senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 公司包唔包我哋伙食㗎？
examples.jyutping: gung1 si1 baau1 m4 baau1 ngo5 dei6 fo2 sik6 gaa3?
examples.translation: Does our company provide meals for us?

senses.definition: 放#閃光彈 嘅簡稱；#炫耀 同自己伴侶嘅親密關係 (to show off one's relationship with one's romantic partner)

examples.translation: The lovers always show off their relationship, neglecting the feeling of those who are single.

senses.definition: #老虎 個#口 (tiger's mouth)

examples.translation: The road is as danger as tiger's mouth

senses.definition: 拇指同食指之間連接處嘅平面 (the adjacent surfaces of the thumb and the index finger)

examples.text: 打咗成日網球，揸拍揸到個虎口都痛。
examples.translation: I played tennis for whole day, I hold the rack for too long now even the adjacent surfaces of the thumb and the index finger feels hurt.

senses.definition: 地盤工人嘅主管；主要負責分配工作，同埋睇實工程進度 (construction foreman)

examples.jyutping: faa1 sik1 lau4 bing1
examples.translation: figure skating

山峰名；#香港 第二高嘅山峰，亦係#大嶼山 最高嘅山，主峰（鳳峰）高度海拔934米 (Lantau Peak)

examples.text: 呢本書咁悶，我都唔知你點睇得晒。

examples.jyutping: zuk1 maa4 maa4 fuk1 jyu4 dung1 hoi2, sau6 bei2 naam4 saan1!

senses.definition: 指股票可以再次開始交易 ((of stocks) to be resumed)

senses.definition: 黑社會術語，指#分家。而相對喺同一瓣數（黑社會社團）入面分帳就叫「行AA」，引申出#AA制 一詞。 (divide up family/group property and go independent)

examples.translation: Kwan, are you going to split up?

senses.definition: 標準；規律；榜樣；例子 (standard; pattern; model; example)

senses.definition: 界限；局限；限制 (restrictions; limits)

examples.jyutping: fong4 faan6
examples.translation: to be on guard; to take precautions against something

senses.definition: #生字；尤其指#外語 嘅生字 (vocabulary (particularly in a foreign language))

senses.definition: 水源或者精力用盡 (to dry up; to use up)

examples.text: 成十號風球，個海風起雲湧咁。
examples.translation: The typhoon signal number 10 is issued. The sea is all stirring and roiling.

senses.definition: 數量充足，令人滿意 (rich; involving a generous amount)

examples.jyutping: gam1 gwai3 lei6 jeon6 fung1 hau5.

senses.definition: 代指#美國，因為#花旗 係美國國旗嘅俗稱 (a nickname of the United States)

senses.definition: 十八世紀末年，#法國 反王室嘅革命；主張自由、平等同博愛，建立咗第一共和取代波旁王朝，但政治局勢日漸混亂，#拿破崙 就係喺依段時間#上位 嘅 (the French Revolution)

examples.text: 我唔求大富大貴，豐衣足食就夠。

examples.translation: I don't need a lot of money. I just want to live a life of fulfilled basic needs.

senses.definition: #發展 嘅#源頭 (origin)

senses.definition: 蠢人 (an idiot, a nerd(literally: sweet potato head))

senses.definition: 以竹骨糊紙，引線乘風而飛升，作為玩具（量詞：隻） (kite)

senses.definition: #八達通 餘額少過零，需要喺再次交易之前增值 (to incur a negative value on an Octopus Card)

examples.jyutping: ngo5 zoeng1 baat3 daat6 tung1 fu6 zo2 cin2 jap6 m4 dou2 zaap6.

senses.definition: 婚姻關係之中，丈夫嘅原生家庭 (husband's family)

senses.definition: 用嘲笑、鄙視、誇張、或者講反話嘅方式突出錯誤、時弊 (to satirise; to mock)

senses.definition: 喺公眾地方打鬥 (to fight openly)

senses.definition: 晴朗暖和嘅天氣，令人感到清新舒服 (gentle breeze and bright sunshine; warm and sunny weather)

examples.jyutping: gam1 jat6 fung1 wo4 jat6 lai6, zeoi3 ngaam1 heoi3 haang4 saan1.

senses.definition: 瞓覺嗰陣踢自己張被，通常形容嬰兒或者小朋友 ((usually for babies and toddlers) to kick off one's own blanket or cover when sleeping)

examples.translation: You kicked off your blanket when sleeping, didn't you? It must be why you have caught a cold.

senses.definition: 即係#樂趣 (joy)

senses.definition: 一種喺沙漠生長嘅藻類，可以食用 (Fat choy (nostoc flagelliforme), a terrestrial cyanobacterium that is used as a vegetable in Chinese cuisine)

examples.jyutping: fung1 cuk1 sou3 zik6

senses.definition: 一班人開心噉團聚 (to gather or reunite happily)

examples.text: 難得大家歡聚一堂，不如影番幅相做記念喇！

examples.translation: We don't always have time to gather so happily. Let's take a photo to remember it!

examples.translation: His life fell apart after he lost his job.

examples.translation: Hong Kong is a rich and populous society.

senses.definition: 用嚟寫#揮春 嘅紙，通常紅色或者橙色底（量詞：張） (paper for red couplets)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: go2 wai2 zing3 zi6 ming4 sing1 gam3 leng3 zai2, jat1 ding6 jau5 hou2 do1 fut3 taai2 gyun1 cin2 zi1 ci4 keoi5 laa1!
examples.translation: That rising political star is quite handsome, so I bet he has a lot of wealthy women sponsoring him.

senses.definition: 日本嘅紙牌遊戲「花札」，可以用嚟玩唔同嘅遊戲，例如兩個人玩嘅「來來（koikoi）」，三至七個人玩嘅「八八」等，玩法同#十五湖 嘅遊戲有啲相似 (hanafuda)

senses.definition: 形容天氣#時熱時凍，變化大難預算 ((of weather) sometimes cold / chilly, sometimes hot / warm; used to describe a drastic swing in temperature)

examples.translation: Temperature swings from cold to hot this week. Take care and don't catch a cold.

senses.definition: 引申對人或事嘅態度多變，有時熱情有時冷淡 (used to describe any frequent change in attitude towards another person or something; being warm, friendly, passionate sometimes, but other times cold, distant, indifferent)

examples.jyutping: keoi5 deoi3 ngo5 fat1 laang5 fat1 jit6, ngo5 dou1 m4 zi1 keoi5 hai6 mai6 zung1 ji3 ngo5.
examples.translation: He is sometimes passionate to me but sometimes cold to me, I don't know whether he loves me or not.

senses.definition: 速度高；動作時間短 (quickly; deftly)

senses.definition: 令人唔開心、唔鍾意嘅 (disgusted; repugnance)

senses.definition: 以前流行兩廣一帶嘅賭博方法。喺張枱上畫個十字，分成一至四門俾賭客落注。另一邊用竹蓆墊住幾十個相同大小嘅攤子（可以用銅錢、衣鈕、蠶豆、圍棋棋子等），賭局開始，莊家用一個小碗做「攤盅」隨機蓋著部分銅錢。賭客下注後，莊家打開小碗進行點算，稱為「攤」或「行皮」-- 以籐條或竹籤扒開攤子，以四粒一組為一「皮」，最後餘數即為賭局結果。 (Fan-tan - a form of gambling previously popular in southern China. Literally: repeated division. A cross is drawn in the center of an ordinary table, marked 1, 2, 3 and 4, for placing the bet. The banker on another side places a bamboo mat and puts on a double handful of small buttons, beads, coins, or dried beans, which he covers part of the buttons with a small bowl. When all bets are placed, the bowl is removed and the croupier uses a small bamboo stick to remove the buttons from the heap, four at a time as a "pack", this action is called "dividing" or "packing", until the final batch is reached, the game result is the number of leftover in the last batch.)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 依家己經好少見人賭番攤。
examples.translation: Nowadays hardly see people playing Fan-tan.

examples.text: 隨刊附上洗頭水試用裝一包。
examples.translation: Enclosed with the magazine is a trial pack of shampoo.

senses.definition: 書本、報告書嘅主要內容以外嘅額外內容 （量詞:頁） (appendix; enclosure)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 呢本字典嘅附錄有二十頁。
examples.translation: The appendix of this dictionary is twenty pages.

senses.definition: 將身體劏開 (to cut open; to dissect)

senses.definition: 唔通過一啲議案、計劃 (to reject; to vote down; to veto, esp. a plan)

senses.definition: 容易衝動，畀情緒影響 (impetuous; impulsive)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: an impetuous personality

senses.definition: 爭人錢 (to be in debt)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to be heavily in debt

senses.definition: 形容人欺騙其他人嘅感情；具體啲講，就係本身鐘意一個人，令對象鐘意返佢轉頭，但係最後又拋棄呢個對象 (owing somebody's love; betraying lover)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: a man who betrays in love

senses.definition: 跟隨着主要嘅人/物一齊 (to add; to attach)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: appendix

senses.definition: 響應其他人 (to agree to)

examples.translation: to agree

senses.definition: 全面禁止一樣嘢出現 (to use every means to bar somebody from doing something)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 新聞自由係唔可以封殺嘅。
examples.translation: Press freedom should not be blocked.

senses.definition: 國家嘅君主賞賜畀人嘅稱號 (an honored name given by the king/emperor)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 協助極之急切需要幫助嘅人 (to help or support somebody in distress)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to help those in emergency

senses.definition: 佛教、道教嘅信徒出家之後，主持嘅和尚、道士會幫佢改過個名，呢個名就係法名；法名之外，會再幫佢改一個外號，呢個外號就係法號 (dharma name)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 藝人劉德華嘅法號叫「慧果」。
examples.translation: Celebrity Andy Lau's dharma name is called "Fruit of Wisdom".

senses.definition: 質地比較粗嘅紡織物，通常由麻或者棉線織成，因為最初用嚟整船帆而得名（量詞:塊） (canvas)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: canvas shoes; deck shoes

senses.definition: 令人舒暢嘅香味，多數形容花嘅香味 (fragrant; aromatic)
senses.label: 形容詞

senses.definition: #貨 嘅樣本，通常免費，等人決定買唔買多啲 (sample of goods)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 水加熱到蒸發嘅狀態 (boiling)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: boiling point

senses.definition: 指示#軍隊 向某地方出發 (to send an army)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 當年德國揮軍蘇聯，結果打咗大敗仗。
examples.translation: Years ago Germany sent their army to the Soviet Union, suffering a big failure.

senses.definition: 對自己嘅輸而感到甘心、信服 (to admit one's defeat)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我就係唔服輸㗎喇，再鬥多次吖。
examples.translation: I will never admit my defeat. Let's compete once more.

senses.definition: 將藥用嘅物料堆喺皮膚表面 (to apply something on the skin)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: to apply herbs on the skin

senses.definition: 形容植物完全冇晒生命力 (rotten)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 雖然枝玫瑰花枯朽咗，但係我仲想留住佢。
examples.translation: Although the rose is rotten, I still want to keep it.

senses.definition: 將敵人變成#俘虜 (to capture an enemy)
senses.label: 動詞

senses.definition: 有錢嘅家庭 (a rich family)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 富家女我可高攀不起。（有錢女仔我真係襯唔起。）
examples.translation: I think the rich girl is unapproachable for me.

senses.definition: 結合喺一齊 (combine)

examples.translation: compound

senses.definition: 再檢查多一次 (to check again; to re-examine)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 請你複查一次當日嘅紀錄。
examples.translation: Please re-examine the record on that day.

senses.definition: 已經構思好但係未寫出嚟嘅文稿 (a draft worked out in one's mind)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 稱呼自己丈夫嘅敬語（量詞:位） (your's husband)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 錢同物質充足，足夠自用 (abundant; plentiful)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 要生活富足最緊要知足。
examples.translation: Contentedness is what leads to an abundant life.

senses.definition: 有錢之餘地位高 (rich and honourable)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.text: 佢身光頸靚，一睇就知係富貴人家喇！
examples.translation: He's really well dressed, once you see him and you'll know he must come from a rich family.

senses.definition: 上咗年紀嘅女性 (woman)
senses.label: 語素

examples.translation: old woman

senses.definition: 已經結婚嘅女人 (married woman)

examples.translation: lady

senses.definition: 快速送貨或者送信嘅服務 (express delivery)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 令人痛快或者稱心如意嘅事 (delightful experience)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 知己相逢，實在係平生一大快事。
examples.jyutping: zi1 gei1 soeng1 fung4, sat6 zoi6 hai6 ping4 sang1 jat1 daai6 faai3 si6.
examples.translation: It's indeed a greatly delightful experience in one's life to meet with one's bosom friend.

senses.definition: 提供資訊嘅媒體；通常係節目命名果陣會噉寫 (news)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: sports news

senses.definition: #幽默；言行舉止詼諧並帶有深度 (humorous; amusing)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: He is a humorous guy.

senses.definition: 從相反角度觀察 (by contrast)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 其他同學已經開始温緊書，反觀你仲係度打緊機。
examples.translation: Your classmates are studying already; by contrast, you are still playing computer games.

senses.definition: 令啲嘢着火 (to burn; to set fire to)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.translation: the burning of Yuanming Yuan Garden (the Imperial Palace of Qing Dynasty)

senses.definition: 食物非常#辣 (burning and scorching)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.translation: the hot and spicy Sichuan hotpot

senses.definition: 帶有性暗示，意淫 ((fig.) lustful; steamy; arousing or appealing to sexual desire or imagination)

examples.text: 她拒絕演出呢個火辣辣嘅鏡頭。
examples.translation: The actress refuses to take part in this steamy love scene.

senses.definition: 喺空中#翻滾 (to roll in air)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 跳水比賽會有好多翻騰嘅動作。
examples.translation: You can see many rotations in a diving competition.

senses.definition: 汽車傾斜、反轉 ((of vehicles) overturn, to turn upside down)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 旅遊巴翻覆，以致多人受傷。
examples.translation: The overturn of the coach causes a large number of injuries.

senses.definition: 容易發嬲，情緒容易激動 (furious; hot-tempered)

examples.text: 佢個人好火爆，係唔係都爆粗。
examples.translation: He is very hot-tempered. He swears at the slightest provocation.

senses.definition: 形容頭大，耳仔垂落嚟嘅樣 ((of physical appearance of people) having a fat head and drooping ears)

senses.definition: 肉食 (meat)

senses.definition: 意見對立而爭執、互相攻擊 (dispute)

examples.text: 化解紛爭需要理解對方嘅立場。
examples.translation: To settle a dispute, it is important to understand how your opponents think.

senses.definition: 香氣 (sweet-smelling)

senses.definition: 兩人決定結婚，但係未辦手續 （量詞:段/個） (wedding engagement)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我同佢之間有婚約，我諗唔可以同你一齊。
examples.translation: He and I got engaged. I think there is no way that we can become lovers.

senses.definition: 結婚嘅文雅講法 (marriage)

examples.translation: wedding photography

examples.jyutping: gam1 ci3 leoi5 cing4 faa1 fai3 saam1 maan6 man1.
examples.translation: This trip costs $30000.

senses.definition: 中國傳統戲曲嘅角色分類；花旦係女性嘅形象，多數比較活潑（量詞:個） (main young female character in a traditional Chinese opera)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 八卦新聞、資訊；唔重要但富有趣味嘅新聞（量詞:則） (titbit; news of interest)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 唔好淨係睇花邊新聞，而唔留意國家大事啦。
examples.translation: Don't just look for titbits and not paying attention to the state affairs.

senses.definition: 有裝飾過嘅邊界（量詞:條） (border of decorative patterns; lace)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.translation: The borders of this photo are gorgeous.

senses.definition: 即係腸痛水，係一種用嚟醫小朋友肚痛同其它腸胃不適嘅成藥，通常含有酒精、梳打、砂糖同埋香草 (gripe water)

senses.definition: 高糖份飲品 (beverages with high sugar content)

examples.text: 你次次一跑完步就買肥仔水飲，一罐八羹糖呀，噉點減到肥呀？
examples.jyutping: nei5 ci3 ci3 jat1 paau2 jyun4 bou6 zau6 maai5 fei4 zai2 seoi2 jam2, jat1 gun3 baat3 gang1 tong4 aa3, gam2 dim2 gaam2 dou2 fei4 aa3?
examples.translation: How will you ever lose weight if you go for a soft drink after every jog? That's eight teaspoons of sugar per can!

senses.definition: 指隻船完全反轉 ((of boats) to turn over completely; to turn turtle)

examples.text: 睇下！有隻龍舟反咗艇呀。
examples.translation: Look! A dragonboat turned turtle.

examples.translation: It's so funny I'm gonna die!
